1.verse: Jesus Ancesta Guys - Dis book tell bout Jesus an his ancesta guys. He da Christ, da Spesho Guy God Wen Send. He from King David ohana, an David, he from Abraham ohana.

2.verse: Dis Jesus ohana. Get fourteen faddas from Abraham to David: Abraham, he Isaac fadda. Isaac, he Jacob fadda. Jacob, he Judah fadda, an all Judah bruddas, he dea fadda too.

3.verse: Judah, he Perez an Zerah fadda, an Tamar, she dea mudda. Perez, he Hezron fadda. Hezron, he Ram fadda.

4.verse: Ram, he Aminadab fadda. Aminadab, he Nashon fadda. Nashon, he Salmon fadda.

5.verse: Salmon, he Boaz fadda, an Rahab, she Boaz mudda. Boaz, he Obed fadda, an Ruth, she Obed mudda. Obed, he Jesse fadda.

6.verse: Jesse, he King David fadda. Den had fourteen faddas from David till da captcha wen dey take um away Babylon side: David, he Solomon fadda. An Solomon mudda, befo dat she Uriah wife.

7.verse: Solomon, he Rehoboam fadda. Rehoboam, he Abijah fadda. Abijah, he Asa fadda.

8.verse: Asa, he Jehoshafat fadda. Jehoshafat, he Joram fadda. Joram, he Uzziah fadda.

9.verse: Uzziah, he Jotham fadda. Jotham, he Ahaz fadda. Ahaz, he Hezekiah fadda.

10.verse: Hezekiah, he Manasseh fadda. Manasseh, he Amon fadda. Amon, he Josiah fadda.

11.verse: Josiah, he Jekoniah fadda, an Jekoniah bruddas too. Was dat time wen da armies wen captcha all da Jewish peopo, an take um away Babylon side.

12.verse: Afta dey take um away Babylon side, had fourteen faddas: Jekoniah, he Shealtiel fadda. Shealtiel, he Zerubbabel fadda.

13.verse: Zerubbabel, he Abiud fadda. Abiud, he Eliakim fadda. Eliakim, he Azor fadda.

14.verse: Azor, he Zadok fadda. Zadok, he Akim fadda. Akim, he Eliud fadda.

15.verse: Eliud, he Eleazar fadda. Eleazar, he Mathan fadda. Mathan, he Jacob fadda.

16.verse: Jacob, he Joseph fadda. Joseph, he Mary husban. Mary wen born Jesus, da one dey call da Christ guy, da Spesho Guy God Wen Send.

17.verse: So, all da faddas from Abraham till King David, dey fourteen faddas, one afta da odda, an from King David till da captcha wen dey take um away Babylon side, dey fourteen faddas, an from wen dey take um away Babylon side till Jesus, da Christ guy, dey fourteen faddas.

18.verse: Jesus Wen Born - Now befo Mary born Jesus, da Christ guy, da Spesho Guy God Wen Send, dis wen happen. Mary, she make ready fo marry Joseph. But befo dey wen marry, dis wat wen happen: Godʼs Good an Spesho Spirit wen make her get hapai.

19.verse: Joseph, da guy dat goin come her husban, he one guy dat do da right ting everytime, an he no like make her shame to da peopo. So he tink, “I no goin marry her, but I no goin tell nobody.”

20.verse: But wen he stay tinking lidat, right den an dea, one angel messenja guy from da Good Boss Up Dea Inside Da Sky come by him, wen he stay dreaming. Da angel guy say, “Eh Joseph! You from King David ohana. No scared take Mary fo come yoa wife, cuz she hapai from Godʼs Spirit dat stay good an spesho.

21.verse: She goin born one boy, an you goin name him Jesus, cuz he goin take his peopo outa da kine bad stuff dey do.”

22.verse: All dis happen jalike Isaiah wen say, da guy who talk fo God long time ago,

23.verse: “Listen! One young wahine Who neva sleep wit nobody, Goin get hapai. She goin born one boy. Dey goin name him Emmanuel.” (“Emmanuel” stay mean, “God stay hea now wit us guys.”)

24.verse: Joseph wake up an he do wat da angel guy from da Boss wen tell him. He take Mary home, fo come his wife.

25.verse: But he neva sleep wit her befo she born her boy. An he name him Jesus.

1.verse: Da Smart Guys Who Know Plenny Bout Da Stars - Jesus, he born Betlehem town, Judea side. Herod, he da king dat time. An you know wat? Had dese smart guys who know plenny bout da stars, wen come Jerusalem town from one far place, from da east side. Dey saying,

2.verse: “Wea da boy dat born, da King fo da Jews? We wen spock one star come up da east side dat show dat he born awready, an we come hea fo go down in front him an show him plenny respeck.”

3.verse: King Herod hear dat, an he all shook up an scared. All da peopo inside Jerusalem town, dey all shook up an scared too.

4.verse: Den Herod wen tell fo come by him all da main priest guys an all da teacha guys who teach Godʼs Rules to da peopo. He say, “Try tell me wea Godʼs Spesho Guy goin born.”

5.verse: Dey tell um, “He goin born Betlehem, Judea side. Cuz da guy Micah wen say (he one guy dat talk fo God long time ago),

6.verse: ‘Eh! You Betlehem guys, ova dea Judah side! All da leadas inside Judah Tink Betlehem importan. Cuz from dea goin come one leada. He goin take care Godʼs peopo, Da Israel peopo.’ ”

7.verse: Den Herod tell da guys who know plenny bout da stars fo come by him. Dey wen come, but dey neva tell nobody. He find out from dem wat time da star wen show up inside da sky.

8.verse: Den he send um Betlehem. He say, “Go! Look all ova da place till you find da boy. Den come back ova hea an tell me. Cuz I like go dea, fo go down in front him an show him respeck too.”

9.verse: Afta dey hear wat da king say, dey go. An you know wat? Dat same star, da one dey wen see befo, wen dey wen stay east side, dat star go in front dem, an stop right ova da place wea da boy stay.

10.verse: Dey wen spock da star, an eh! dey wen feel real good inside.

11.verse: Dey go inside da house. Dey see da boy an his mudda Mary. Dey go down in front him an show him respeck. Den dey take out dea rich stuffs, an give um to Jesus. Dey give um gold, incense, an spesho kine perfume.

12.verse: Afta dat dey get one dream from God. He tell um, “You guys betta not go back by King Herod.” So dey go home one diffren way.

13.verse: Dey Run Away Egypt Side - Afta da guys who know plenny bout da stars wen go home, you know wat? Had one angel guy from da Boss Up Dea come by Joseph, wen he stay dreaming. Da angel guy tell him, “Eh Joseph! Wake up! Take yoa boy an his mudda, an go run Egypt side. Stay ova dea till I tell you fo come back. King Herod, he goin look fo da boy fo kill him, dass why.”

14.verse: So Joseph get up, an take his boy an Mary, an dey wen run Egypt side, dat nite.

15.verse: Dey stay dea till Herod wen mahke. Wen all dis happen, was jalike Hosea wen say, da guy dat talk fo God long time ago, “I wen tell my boy fo come outa Egypt.”

16.verse: Herod Kill da Kids - King Herod, he wen find out eh, dat da guys dat know plenny bout da stars wen fool him, an he wen come so wild, he wen go send his army guys an tell um, “Go kill all da small boys inside Betlehem an all da odda place ova dea.” Den dey wen kill all da boys two years old an mo younga. Herod wen figga da time, cuz da guys who know plenny bout da stars wen tell him wat time da star wen show up first time.

17.verse: Dis happen jalike Jeremiah wen say, da guy dat talk fo God long time ago:

18.verse: “Dey hear one voice from inside Ramah, Rachel, she stay crying real hard, She real sore inside, Crying fo her kids, She no like nobody come by her, Cuz da kids mahke awready.”

19.verse: Dey Come Back From Egypt Side - Lata, King Herod wen mahke. One angel messenja guy from da Boss come by Joseph wen he stay dreaming ova dea Egypt side. Da angel guy tell him,

20.verse: “Eh Joseph! Wake up! Take yoa boy an his mudda, an go Israel side. Da guys dat like kill da boy, stay mahke awready.”

21.verse: So den Joseph wen get up, fo take Jesus an Mary. Dey wen go back Israel side.

22.verse: But he hear dat Arkelaus wen come king Judea side afta his fadda Herod wen mahke. Joseph scared fo go ova dea. God tell him inside one dream, “You betta not go ova dea.” So he go Galilee side,

23.verse: an make house Nazaret town. Dis happen jalike da guys who talk fo God long time ago wen say, “Dey goin call him ‘da Nazaret guy.’ ”

1.verse: John Da Baptiza Guy Teach Da Peopo - Afta Jesus wen grow up, John Da Baptiza guy show up inside da boonies Judea side, fo teach da peopo.

2.verse: He say, “You guys gotta like pau all da kine bad stuff you stay doing now, an no do um no moa. Cuz God in da sky stay King hea now.”

3.verse: Befo time, da guy who talk fo God, Isaiah, was talking bout John wen he say dis: “He goin talk real loud inside da boonies, ‘Eh! Make da road ready fo da Good Boss Up Dea Inside Da Sky! Make um strait fo him!’ ”

4.verse: An you know, John, his clothes eh, come from da camel hair. He wen make one rope outa leather fo belt. He eat grasshoppa, an he get honey from da bees.

5.verse: Had choke peopo, dey going by him ova dea, from Jerusalem, an from Judea, an from all ova from da Jordan River side.

6.verse: Dey telling strait out all da kine bad stuff dey wen do, an he baptizing dem in da Jordan River.

7.verse: Plenny Pharisee guys an Sadducee guys come so he can baptize dem too. He see um, an say, “Eh you guys! You guys jalike one snake ohana! God no goin take all da bad kine stuff you do. He goin punish you guys fo dat. No way you guys can get away!

8.verse: Jalike one fruit tree give same kine fruit, you guys gotta do da kine good stuff dat show you like pau all da kine bad stuff you doing, an no do um no moa.

9.verse: Eh! No tink an tell yoaself, ‘Us guys all right, cuz Abraham our main fadda.’ I telling you guys now, God can take dese rocks ova hea an make kids fo Abraham outa dem.

10.verse: Awready get one guy wit one ax, all ready fo cut da tree roots. All da trees dat no make good fruit, he goin cut um, an throw um inside da fire.

11.verse: “All you guys, I goin baptize you guys wit water. Dat goin show dat you guys like pau all da kine bad stuff you doing an no do um no moa. But afta me, goin come one nodda guy. He get mo power den me. An you know wat? I not even spesho nuff fo help him hemo his slippas. Da way he goin baptize you guys, jalike he goin baptize you guys wit Godʼs Good an Spesho Spirit fo take ova you, jalike he baptize you guys wit fire!

12.verse: Jalike he goin put all da wheat inside da basket an let da wind blow all da no good parts from da wheat, an den he goin put dat wheat inside da storage place. Afta dat, he goin burn all da no good parts inside da fire dat neva eva goin go out.”

13.verse: John Baptize Jesus - Dat time, Jesus come from Galilee side to da Jordan River wea John stay, so John can baptize him.

14.verse: But John wen tell Jesus, “How come you come by me? Eh, me, I no can baptize you. Eh, mo betta you baptize me! I need dat.”

15.verse: But Jesus say, “No need worry. Dis okay fo now, fo show we like do everyting da right way.” So John say, “Okay, we go den.” An he baptize Jesus.

16.verse: Right afta John baptize him, Jesus come out from da water, an you know wat? Da sky wen rip open. Jesus spock Godʼs Spirit coming down on top him. Look jalike one dove.

17.verse: An wow! Had one voice from da sky wen say, “Dis my boy. I get love an aloha fo him fo real kine, an I stay good inside cuz a him!”

1.verse: Da Devil Try Presha Jesus Do Bad Kine Stuffs - Afta dat, Godʼs Spirit take Jesus to da boonies, so da main Devil can try presha him make um do bad kine stuff.

2.verse: Forty day, forty nite, Jesus pray an he neva like eat notting. Afta dat time he stay real hungry.

3.verse: So da Devil wen go by him an presha him. He tell Jesus, “So, wat? You Godʼs Boy fo real kine? Den tell dese rocks hea fo come food.”

4.verse: But Jesus say, “Da Bible say, ‘No mo nobody dat can live ony on food, Gotta listen to everyting God say, Fo live fo real kine.’ ”

5.verse: Den da Devil take him to Jerusalem, da town dat stay spesho fo God, an make him go up da big tower on top da temple.

6.verse: Da Devil say, “So, wat? You Godʼs Boy fo real kine? Kay den, go jump down dea, cuz da Bible say, ‘God goin tell his angel messenja guys fo take care you. Da Bible say dis too: Dey goin bring you down wit dea hands, So yoa foot no hit da rocks.’ ”

7.verse: But Jesus tell him, “Da Bible say: ‘God, he yoa Boss. So no try presha him fo make um show proof dat he God.’ ”

8.verse: Den da Devil take him up on top one big mountain, an show him all da diffren countries all ova da world, an how awesome dey stay.

9.verse: Da Devil tell um, “I give you all dis, if you go down an give me plenny respeck.”

10.verse: Jesus tell him, “Beat it, Devil! Da Bible say, ‘Gotta go down on yoa knees An give plenny respeck to God yoa Boss, An live an work ony fo him.’ ”

11.verse: Den da Devil go way from Jesus, an you know wat? Angel guys from da Boss come an kokua Jesus.

12.verse: Jesus Start Fo Teach Galilee Side - Dat time, Herod guys wen throw John Da Baptiza Guy in jail. Jesus wen hear dat, an he go Galilee side.

13.verse: He go Nazaret town, an den go from dea, an make house inside Capernaum. Dass one town by da lake side, ova dea Zebulun an Naftali side.

14.verse: Dis wen happen jalike da guy Isaiah wen say, who talk fo God long time ago:

15.verse: “Zebulun side, Naftali side, On top da road to da lake, da odda side Jordan River, Galilee side wea get diffren peopos dat donno God,

16.verse: Da peopo ova dea dat stay inside da dark, Dey see one big light now. An all da guys dat stay In da dark place wea peopo goin mahke, Da light come fo dem.”

17.verse: Dass wen Jesus start fo teach da peopo. He say, “You guys gotta come sorry fo all da kine bad stuff you doing, an no do um no moa, cuz God in da sky stay King hea now.”

18.verse: Jesus Tell Four Fisha Guys Fo Come Wit Him - One time Jesus walking by Galilee Lake, an he spock two bruddas, Simon da guy dey call Peter, an Andrew his brudda. Dey stay throwing net inside da water, cuz dey fisha guys.

19.verse: He tell um, “Eh, you guys! Go wit me! Da way you guys bring in da fish, I goin teach you guys how fo bring in peopo too!”

20.verse: Right den an dea, dey jus wen leave da nets, an go wit him.

21.verse: Going from dea, he spock two odda bruddas, James an his brudda John. Zebedee, dea fadda. Dey inside da boat wit dea fadda, fixing da nets. Jesus tell um fo come.

22.verse: Dey go way from da boat an dea fadda, an go wit him right den an dea.

23.verse: Jesus Teach An Make Peopo Come Good - Den Jesus wen go all ova Galilee, teaching inside da Jewish churches. He telling da peopo all da Good Kine Stuff bout how dey can get God fo dea King, an he making all da sick peopo come good from all kine sick.

24.verse: Everybody hear bout him, from dea all ova Syria. Dey bring all da peopo wit all kine sick by him: everybody dat hurt, an suffa plenny, da peopo dat get bad spirits dat wen take ova dem, peopo dat shake an roll all ova, an peopo dat no can move. An Jesus make um all come good.

25.verse: Plenny peopo wen go wit him from Galilee side, from all da Ten Towns, from Jerusalem, from Judea, an from da odda side Jordan River.

1.verse: Jesus Teach On Top Da Mountain Side - Jesus see choke peopo, an he go up da mountain litto bit. He sit down dea fo teach, an da guys he wen pick fo teach come by him fo listen.

2.verse: Da Peopo Dat Stay Good Inside - He wen start fo teach um. He tell um:

3.verse: “Da peopo dat know dey need God inside dea heart, Dey can stay good inside Cuz God in da sky, he dea King.

4.verse: “Da peopo dat cry inside dea heart, Dey can stay good inside Cuz God goin kokua dem.

5.verse: “Da peopo dat no need put demself first everytime, Dey can stay good inside Cuz God goin give um da whole world.

6.verse: “Da peopo dat everytime really like do da right ting, Dey can stay good inside Cuz God goin help um do um.

7.verse: “Da peopo dat pity da odda peopo, an give um chance, Dey can stay good inside Cuz God goin pity dem an give um chance too.

8.verse: “Da peopo dat hundred percent fo God inside, Dey can stay good inside Cuz dey goin see God.

9.verse: “Da peopo dat help da odda peopo come friends again, Dey can stay good inside Cuz God goin say, ‘Dey my kids.’

10.verse: “Da peopo dat do right, an suffa fo dat, Dey can stay good inside Cuz God in da sky, he dea King.

11.verse: “You guys can stay good inside wen dey talk bad to you guys, an make you guys suffa, an dey talk any kine bout you guys, cuz you guys mines, but dey bulai.

12.verse: Dance an sing, cuz bumbye God goin have plenny good kine stuff fo you guys wea he stay inside da sky. Eh, jalike befo time, da guys God wen send fo talk fo him long time ago, had peopo dat wen make dem suffa too.

13.verse: Salt An Light - “You guys know how da food need salt fo stay good. Same ting, da peopo all ova da world need you guys. But if da salt no mo taste, how you goin make um work like salt again? Dat kine salt no good. Ony ting can do, throw da salt outside wea da peopo walk.

14.verse: “You guys jalike da light dat help da peopo all ova da world fo see. You no can hide one town on top one hill.

15.verse: Same ting, you no light one lamp an den cover um up. You put um up on top one high place, yeah? Den everybody inside da house can see.

16.verse: So, you guys jalike da light. Let everybody see da good kine stuff you guys doing. Den dey goin say dat yoa Fadda, God, dat stay in da sky, eh! he awesome!

17.verse: Jesus Teach Bout Godʼs Rules - “No tink I stay hea fo get rid a Godʼs Rules an da stuff da guys who talk fo God wen say. I neva come fo wipe out Godʼs Rules. I come fo make everyting dey wen talk bout come true.

18.verse: Dass right! An I tell you guys dis too: Da sky an da world no goin pau befo everyting dat Godʼs Rules say come true. Nobody no can take notting from Godʼs Rules, not even one dot o one small line.

19.verse: Whoeva no do jus one small kine Rule from God, cuz he tink, ‘Dat Rule notting,’ an he teach da odda guys fo say dat Rule notting too, da King from da sky goin make dat guy jalike he notting. But whoeva do wat all Godʼs Rules say, an teach da odda guys fo do um too, da King from da sky goin make him importan.

20.verse: I telling you guys, if you no do da right tings, mo den da teacha guys dat teach Godʼs Rules an da Pharisee guys, God in da sky no goin come yoa King.

21.verse: Da Guy Dat Huhu Wit His Brudda - “You guys wen hear wat God wen tell da peopo from befo time. He say, ‘No go kill nobody. Whoeva go kill somebody gotta come in front da judge.’

22.verse: But eh! I tell you guys dis: Whoeva stay huhu wit his brudda gotta come in front da judge. Whoeva tell his brudda, ‘You no good!’ gotta come in front da main leadas. But whoeva tell, ‘You stupid an good fo notting!’ gotta go to da Hell fire.

23.verse: “So, if you bring one gif fo da Good Boss inside da temple, an you rememba yoa brudda huhu wit you cuz you wen do someting to him,

24.verse: leave yoa gif ova dea, an go make good to yoa brudda. Den you can go back an give yoa gif to da Boss.

25.verse: “If somebody like take you in front da judge, quick, try get everyting right wit dem wen you still get chance. If you no do dat, dey goin give you to da judge, an he goin give you to da police, an dey goin put you inside jail.

26.verse: I telling you da trut, you gotta pay every penny you owe befo you can come out.

27.verse: Da Guy Dat Fool Aroun Wit Da Odda Guyʼs Wife - “You guys wen hear wat God wen say: ‘No go fool aroun behind yoa husban o yoa wifeʼs back.’

28.verse: But eh! I telling you guys dis: Whoeva look at one wahine an like fool aroun her, he wen do um awready inside his heart.

29.verse: If da right eye make you do bad kine stuff lidat, dig um out, an throw um away! No matta you ony get one eye -- mo worse da whole body go Hell!

30.verse: If da right hand make you do bad kine stuff, cut um off an throw um away! No matta you ony get one hand -- mo worse da whole body go Hell!

31.verse: Da Guy Dat Dump His Wife - “God wen say: ‘Whoeva goin dump his wife, gotta write um down on one divorce paper an give um to her.’

32.verse: But eh! I telling you guys dis: Whoeva dump his wife, an she neva even fool aroun, he make her jalike she wen fool aroun. An if one nodda guy marry her afta her husban wen dump her, dat guy jalike one guy dat go fool aroun da first guyʼs wife.

33.verse: Do Wat You Promise - “An you guys wen hear wat God wen tell da peopo from befo time. He say, ‘No promise someting an den no do um. Cuz you wen promise um in front da Good Boss Up Dea. So, you betta do um!’

34.verse: But eh! I tell you guys dis: No go say, ‘I swear to God.’ No make promise an say ‘I swear by da sky up dea, dat I goin do um!’ cuz dass Godʼs throne, wea he stay sitting cuz he in charge.

35.verse: No make promise an say ‘by da earth,’ cuz dass Godʼs stool fo his feets. No make promise an say ‘by Jerusalem,’ cuz dass da spesho town fo da big King.

36.verse: No make promise an say ‘by my head,’ cuz you no can make one hair come white o black.

37.verse: Ony say, ‘Yeah’ o ‘No.’ Wateva you say mo den dis come from da Bad Guy, da Devil.

38.verse: No Fight Back - “You guys wen hear wat God wen say: ‘If anybody pull out yoa eye, pull out his eye. If anybody broke yoa teet, broke his teet.’

39.verse: But eh! I telling you guys dis: No fight back da bad guys. If anybody slap yoa head one side, mo betta let um slap da odda side too.

40.verse: If anybody take you in front da judge so dey can get yoa shirt, let um take yoa coat too.

41.verse: If one army guy make you carry his stuffs one mile, eh! carry um two miles.

42.verse: Wen somebody aks you fo someting you get, give um. Da guy who like borrow someting from you, no tell um, ‘No!’

43.verse: Love Da Guys Dat Hate You - “You guys wen hear wat God wen say: ‘Show love an aloha fo da peopo dat all aroun you.’ An da peopo say: ‘Hate da guys dat hate you.’

44.verse: But eh! I telling you guys dis: Show love an aloha fo da guys dat hate you! An aks God fo help da guys dat make you suffa!

45.verse: Wen you do dat, you goin show fo real dat you da kine kids dat come from yoa Fadda dat stay in da sky. He make da sun come up fo da bad guys an da good guys. An he send rain fo da guys dat do da right tings, an fo da guys dat no do da right tings.

46.verse: So, if you guys ony get love an aloha fo da guys dat get love an aloha fo you, you tink God owe you guys money fo dat? Nah! Even da tax peopo dat collect money fo tax fo da govermen, dey get love an aloha fo da guys dat get love an aloha fo dem.

47.verse: If you guys say ‘Howzit’ ony to yoa bruddas, you tink you spesho, o wat? Even all da diffren peopos all ova da world dat donno God, dey say ‘Howzit’ to dea bruddas too.

48.verse: All da time you gotta be good hundred percent, jalike yoa Fadda in da sky, he everytime stay good hundred percent.

1.verse: Give To Da Guys Dat No Mo Notting - “Watch out! No good you make show in front peopo wen you do da religious kine stuff, cuz you guys ony like dem see da religious kine stuff dat you guys do. If you guys make lidat, yoa Fadda in da sky no goin give you guys notting.

2.verse: “Wen you guys give money to da guys dat no mo notting, no make big show jalike da guys dat say one ting an do anodda wen dey go inside da Jewish churches an wen dey walk in da town wea da peopo stay. Dey like da peopo say dat dey awesome. Dass right! An I telling you guys dis too: Dey wen get all dea pay awready.

3.verse: “So you guys, wen you give money to da guys dat no mo notting, no tell nobody.

4.verse: Den nobody goin know dat you give money. But yoa Fadda, he can see wat da odda guys no can see, an he goin give you plenny fo dat.

5.verse: How fo Pray - “Wen you guys pray, no make like da guys dat say one ting an do anodda. Dey like stand up an pray inside da Jewish churches o outside wea everybody go, cuz dey like da peopo see wat dey do. Dass right! An I telling you dis too: Dey wen get all dea pay awready.

6.verse: But you guys, wen you pray, go inside yoa room an close da door. Den pray to yoa Fadda. He stay inside da room wit you, wea da odda guys no can see, an he goin give you plenny fo dat. Cuz yoa Fadda can see wat da odda guys no can see.

7.verse: “Wen you guys pray, no say any kine stuff dat mean notting. Get odda peopos all ova da world dat make lidat. Dey tink God goin listen to dem cuz dey say so plenny stuff wen dey pray.

8.verse: No make like dem, cuz yoa Fadda know awready all da stuff you need, befo you aks him.

9.verse: So, pray lidis, ‘God, you our Fadda. You stay inside da sky. We like all da peopo know fo shua how you stay, An dat you stay good an spesho, An we like dem give you plenny respeck.

10.verse: We like you come King fo everybody now. We like everybody make jalike you like, Ova hea inside da world, Jalike da angel guys up inside da sky make jalike you like.

11.verse: Give us da food we need fo today an every day.

12.verse: Hemo our shame, an let us go Fo all da kine bad stuff we do to you, Jalike us guys let da odda guys go awready, An we no stay huhu wit dem Fo all da kine bad stuff dey do to us.

13.verse: No let us get chance fo do bad kine stuff, But take us outa dea, so da Bad Guy no can hurt us. [Cuz you our King, You get da real power, An you stay awesome foeva. Dass it!]’

14.verse: “I telling you guys, if you let da odda guys go afta dey do bad kine stuff to you, den yoa Fadda up dea inside da sky goin let you guys go, an hemo yoa shame fo all da kine bad stuff you guys do.

15.verse: But if you no let da odda guys go afta dey do bad kine stuff to you, den yoa Fadda no goin let you guys go, an he no goin hemo yoa shame fo all da kine bad stuff you guys do.

16.verse: Wen You No Eat So You Can Pray - “You guys, wen you no eat so you can pray, no make long face. Da guys dat say one ting an do anodda, dey try make demself look all hamajang so all da peopo can see dey no eat so dey can pray. Dass right! An I telling you guys dis too: Dey wen get all dea pay awready, an God no goin give um any moa.

17.verse: “But you guys, wen you no eat so you can pray, comb yoa hair an wash yoa face,

18.verse: so wen da peopo see you, dey no goin know you not eating so you can pray. Yoa Fadda see wat da odda guys no can see, an he goin give you plenny fo dat.

19.verse: Stash Plenny Good Kine Stuff Inside Da Sky - “No work hard fo stash da kine stuffs dass importan ova hea inside dis world, cuz da moth an da rust goin eat um up, an da steala guys goin broke inside yoa house an take um.

20.verse: Mo betta you guys do da good kine stuffs dass importan up dea inside da sky wea God stay. Ova dea da moth an da rust no can eat um up, an da steala guys no can broke inside yoa house an take um.

21.verse: Cuz you know, wateva kine stuffs stay da mos importan fo you, dass wea yoa heart stay.

22.verse: Da Light Fo Da Body - “You know, eh, da eye jalike one lamp fo inside da body. If da eye okay, dat mean, da guy stay all light inside. He get good heart fo help peopo.

23.verse: But if da eye no good, dat mean, da guy stay all dark inside. He one greedy bugga! Eh brah, if no mo light inside you, you stay all dark inside fo shua!

24.verse: God An Da Stuffs You Get - “Nobody can work, an two boss guys own him. He goin like listen to one boss an hate da odda. He goin like stick wit one boss an tink da odda guy no good. Same ting, you guys no can work fo da real God an da money god.

25.verse: “Dass why I telling you guys, no worry bout how you goin live, wat you goin eat, wat you goin drink, wat you goin wear. Wat you tink? You live ony fo eat? No way! Yoa body ony fo clotheses? Not even!

26.verse: Look da birds dat fly in da sky. Dey no plant seed, an get crops, an stash um, but yoa Fadda in da sky, he feed um. Tink! You guys mo importan den dem.

27.verse: Wat you worry fo? You tink dat goin make you stay alive one mo hour? No way!

28.verse: “An da clotheses, how come you worry bout dat? Tink! Da flowers dat grow in da field, how dey can grow? Dey no work o make dea own clotheses.

29.verse: But I telling you, even King Solomon, wit all his awesome stuffs, neva get awesome clotheses like da flowers.

30.verse: Da grass inside da field stay growing today, but tomorrow dey goin throw um inside da fire. Eh, God give da grass clotheses lidat, so garans he goin give you guys clotheses. You guys ony trussing God litto bit!

31.verse: “So, eh! no go worry an say, ‘Wat we goin eat?’ o ‘Wat we goin drink?’ o ‘Wat we goin wear?’

32.verse: You know, da odda peopos all ova da world dat donno God, dey try get all dat kine stuff. But yoa Fadda inside da sky, he know you guys need um.

33.verse: Main ting, make God yoa Boss, cuz he da King. Do da right ting jalike he do, an you guys goin get all da stuffs you need.

34.verse: “So no worry bout tomorrow, cuz tomorrow get plenny fo worry bout. Every day get nuff trouble fo dat day.

1.verse: No Make Like One Judge - “If you no like God judge you guys, no judge da odda guys.

2.verse: Da way you guys judge da odda guys, dass how God goin judge you guys too. An da rules you guys use fo judge, he goin use da same rules fo judge you guys.

3.verse: “How come you try spock one small piece junk inside yoa bruddaʼs eye, cuz you know, awready get one big two by four inside yoa own eye.

4.verse: Eh, an how you goin tell yoa brudda, ‘Eh, try let me pull da small piece junk outa yoa eye,’ wen you get one big two by four inside yoa own eye?

5.verse: You say one ting an do anodda! First you gotta take da big two by four outa yoa own eye. Den you can see good fo take da small piece junk outa yoa bruddaʼs eye.

6.verse: “No give stuff dat stay spesho fo God to da guys dat goin talk stink bout um an goin waste um. Cuz dey jalike da dogs dat goin turn aroun fo attack you guys. An dey jalike da wild pigs -- if you give um fancy kine jewelry dat worth plenny, dey ony goin walk all ova on top um, den dey goin turn aroun an waste you guys.

7.verse: Aks, Look, Knock - “Aks God, an you goin get um. Look, an you goin find um. Knock, an God goin open da door fo you.

8.verse: All da guys dat aks, goin get. All da guys dat look fo someting, goin find um. All da guys dat stay knocking on top da door, God goin open da door fo dem.

9.verse: If yoa boy aks you fo bread, you goin give um one rock, o wat?

10.verse: If he aks fo one fish, you goin give um one snake, o wat?

11.verse: Eh, no matta you guys no good, still yet you guys know how fo give good kine stuffs to yoa kids. Fo shua den, yoa Fadda in da sky goin give good kine stuffs to da peopo dat aks him.

12.verse: So, wateva you guys like peopo do to you guys bumbye, make lidat to dem, same ting, now. Dis everyting dat Godʼs Rules say in da Bible, an everyting dat Godʼs talkas wen teach.

13.verse: Da Skinny Gate - “Fo go inside Godʼs place, go inside thru da skinny gate. Get one nodda gate dat stay wide an get plenny room. Dass da gate fo da road fo take you to Hell, an get plenny guys going dat way.

14.verse: But da real gate stay skinny an da real road mo smalla. Dass da one fo bring you to God who goin make you live fo real kine, an ony litto bit guys goin pick dat road.

15.verse: Da Fruit Tree - “Watch out da guys dat say dey talk fo God an teach stuff dat not true. Dey ony make bulai kine. Dey come by you guys an ack all good kine, but fo real kine, inside dey like eat you up, jalike dey wild dogs dat try fo look like dey sheeps.

16.verse: You goin know um by da kine stuff dey do. No can pick da grape o da fig from da kine tree wit thorns, yeah?

17.verse: Da good kine tree goin give good kine fruit, an da no good kine tree goin give junk kine fruit.

18.verse: Da good kine tree no can give junk kine fruit, an da no good kine tree no can give good kine fruit.

19.verse: All da trees dat no give good kine fruit, dey cut um down an throw um on top da fire.

20.verse: From da kine stuff dey stay doing, you goin know wat kine peopo dem.

21.verse: I Donno You Guys - “Goin get peopo dat stay tell me, ‘Eh Boss! Boss!’ But not all a dem goin get God in da sky fo dea King. Ony da peopo dat do wat my Fadda in da sky like, dey going get him fo dea King.

22.verse: Wen dat time come, plenny peopo goin tell me, ‘Eh, Boss, we wen tell everybody we yoa guys wen we wen talk fo you, an wen we wen make da bad kine spirits let go peopo, an wen we wen do stuffs dat show yoa power.’

23.verse: I goin tell um strait, ‘Who you? I donno you guys. Go way from me! You guys stay broke da Rules dat God wen make.’

24.verse: Da Two House Builda Guys - “So you know, whoeva hear wat I say, an go do um, he jalike one smart guy dat make plan, den he build his house on top wea stay solid rock.

25.verse: Da rain wen come, an get plenny water, an da wind wen come from all ova da place, an wen pound da house hard. But da house no fall down, cuz he wen build um wea stay solid rock.

26.verse: “All da guys dat hear wat I say, an no do um, dey jalike one guy dat not tinking, an he build his house wea ony get sand.

27.verse: Da rain wen come, an get plenny water, an da wind wen come from all ova da place, an pound da house hard. Az da house dat wen fall down an wen wipe out!”

28.verse: Jesus Teach Wit Plenny Power - Wen Jesus pau teach, all da peopo, wen blow dea minds fo wat he teach um,

29.verse: cuz he teach wit plenny power. He not jalike da teacha guys dat teach Godʼs Rules, dey no mo power.

1.verse: Jesus Make One Lepa Guy Come Good - Jesus wen go down from da mountain, an plenny peopo wen go wit him.

2.verse: An you know wat? Had one lepa guy wen go by him an go down in front him. He say, “Boss, if you like, you can make me come good, yeah? jalike da way God like.”

3.verse: Jesus wen stick out his hand an touch him, an say, “Okay, I do um. Come good.” Right den an dea da lepa guy come good.

4.verse: Den Jesus tell him, “Make shua dat you no tell nobody bout dis. Go, let da priest guy check you out. No foget make da kine sacrifice, now, jalike Moses wen tell in Godʼs Rules. Den everybody goin know dat you stay good now, an you can go pray wit da odda peopo.”

5.verse: Jesus Make One Captainʼs Worka Guy Come Good - Wen Jesus was going inside Capernaum town, one captain fo da Rome army guys wen come by him fo beg um,

6.verse: “Boss, I get one worka guy dat stay home sick. He no can move, an he stay suffa plenny.”

7.verse: Jesus tell him, “Kay. I goin go yoa house fo make him come good.”

8.verse: But da captain say, “Eh Boss, you know, I not good nuff fo you fo come inside my house. Ony say da ting, den my worka guy goin come good.

9.verse: You know, I get one army boss who tell me wat fo do. An I tell my army guys wat fo do. I tell dis guy, ‘Go,’ an he go. An I tell dat guy, ‘Come,’ an he come. An my slave guy, I tell um, ‘Do dis,’ an he do um.”

10.verse: Jesus wen hear dat, an he tell da odda guys dat stay following him, “Ho! Dis guy get um! An I like tell you guys dis: no mo Israel peopo dat trus me lidat!

11.verse: An I like tell you guys one mo ting: wen God in da sky stay King, goin get plenny guys dat goin come from far away an all aroun, east side an west side, an dey all goin make big party togedda wit Abraham, Isaac, an Jacob.

12.verse: But goin get odda guys, God suppose to be dea King, but dey no like um. An den he goin throw um outside inside da dark. Ova dea dey goin cry plenny an grind dea teet cuz dey so huhu an futless.”

13.verse: Den Jesus tell da captain, “Go. Jalike how you stay trus me, dass how goin be fo you now.” Dat same time, da worka guy wen come good.

14.verse: Jesus Make Plenny Peopo Come Good - Den Jesus wen go Peterʼs house. He go inside, an see Peterʼs mudda-in-law on top da bed. She get feva.

15.verse: He wen touch her hand an da feva wen pau. She wen get up an she wen bring food fo Jesus dem.

16.verse: Afta da sun wen go down, den da peopo dea wen bring plenny guys dat get bad kine spirits dat stay take ova dem. Jesus tell da bad kine spirits, “Let um go!” an dey let um go. He make all da sick peopo come good.

17.verse: Dis wen happen jalike da guy Isaiah, who talk fo God long time ago, wen say: “Was him dat wen hemo all our sick an take um away.”

18.verse: Da Guys Dat Say Dey Going Wit Jesus - Bumbye, Jesus wen see choke peopo aroun him. He tell his guys fo go ova da odda side da lake.

19.verse: One teacha guy dat teach Godʼs Rules wen come by him, an say, “Teacha, I goin go wit you weaeva you go.”

20.verse: Jesus tell him, “Da foxes get hole fo house, an da birds in da sky get nest. But me, da Guy Dass Fo Real, I no mo house fo lay down.”

21.verse: One nodda guy dat Jesus stay teaching tell him, “Eh, Boss, try let me go. I no can go wit you till afta my fadda mahke. Gotta bury um, eh?”

22.verse: But Jesus tell him, “You, jus come wit me an be my guy! Let da mahke peopo bury da mahke peopo.”

23.verse: Jesus Make Da Storm Pau - Jesus an his guys wen go inside one boat.

24.verse: Den had one big storm ova dea, an da waves was bussing ova da boat. But Jesus still yet stay sleeping.

25.verse: His guys wen go wake him up, an tell him, “Eh, Boss! Get us outa dis! We goin mahke!”

26.verse: But he aks um, “How come you guys scared? Wot! You guys no trus me?!” Den he get up. He scold all da winds an da waves. Den everyting wen come good.

27.verse: His guys, wen blow dea minds, an den dey say, “Eh, wea dis guy from? Even da winds an da waves do wat he tell um!”

28.verse: Jesus Make Two Guys Wit Bad Kine Spirits Come Good - He go da odda side da lake, dea wea da Gadara peopo get dea land. Had two guys dea dat da bad kine spirits take um ova. Eh, you know, dem guys, dey ack so wild, jalike dey crazy. Dass why nobody strong nuff fo go dat road. Dey live ova dea wea da dead peopo stay buried. Da two guys come outa dea, an den dey go by Jesus.

29.verse: An eh! dey yelling, “Wat you like do to us, Jesus? You Godʼs Boy! You come hea fo make us suffa befo da time come, o wat?”

30.verse: Had plenny pigs near dea, grinding.

31.verse: Da bad kine spirits wen beg Jesus, “Wen you goin make us let go da guy, we like go inside da pigs an take um ova.”

32.verse: He tell um, “Go.” So dey wen let go da guys, an go take ova da pigs. An you know wat? All da pigs wen run down one steep hill an fall ova da cliff inside da lake, an drown inside da water.

33.verse: Den da pig farmas wen run, an go inside da town, an tell everybody wat wen happen. Dey tell bout da guys who get da bad kine spirits too.

34.verse: All da peopo from inside da town wen go out fo see Jesus. An wen dey wen see him, dey beg um fo go way from dea.

1.verse: Jesus An Da Guy Dat No Can Move - Jesus wen go inside da boat, fo go back da odda side da lake, an he come by da town wea he live.

2.verse: Had some guys dat wen bring one guy by Jesus on top one mat. Da guy, he no can move, notting. Jesus wen see dat, an he tink, “Eh, wow! Dis guys trus me fo real kine, dat I goin make dea friend come good!” Den he tell da guy, “Eh, you, make strong! You know all da kine bad stuff you wen do? I tell you now, da shame from all dat, pau awready!”

3.verse: But get some teacha guys dea dat teach Godʼs Rules. Dey tinking, “Eh, dis guy ack jalike he God! [Ony God can hemo da shame fo da bad kine stuff peopo do!]”

4.verse: But Jesus wen know wat dey tinking. He say, “How come you guys tinking bad kine stuff lidat?

5.verse: I like show proof you guys, dat I da Guy Dass fo Real, an I get da right inside dis world, fo let peopo go an hemo da shame dat dey get fo da bad kine stuff dey wen do. But, easy fo talk bout hemo da shame -- anybody can talk dat kine. But not easy fo do um. Same ting, easy fo tell one sick guy dat no can move, ‘Eh, stand up an move aroun!’ -- anybody can talk dat kine. But not easy fo do um. But now, I goin show proof you guys -- I goin make dis sick guy make strong.” Dass why he tell da guy, “Eh, get up! Take yoa mat an go home awready!”

6.verse: I like show proof you guys, dat I da Guy Dass fo Real, an I get da right inside dis world, fo let peopo go an hemo da shame dat dey get fo da bad kine stuff dey wen do. But, easy fo talk bout hemo da shame -- anybody can talk dat kine. But not easy fo do um. Same ting, easy fo tell one sick guy dat no can move, ‘Eh, stand up an move aroun!’ -- anybody can talk dat kine. But not easy fo do um. But now, I goin show proof you guys -- I goin make dis sick guy make strong.” Dass why he tell da guy, “Eh, get up! Take yoa mat an go home awready!”

7.verse: So da guy wen get up an go home.

8.verse: All da peopo wen see dat, an dey wen come real scared. An dey tell how awesome God stay, cuz he da kine God dat give peopo dat kine power.

9.verse: Jesus Tell Matthew “Be My Guy!” - Den Jesus wen go way from dea. He wen spock one guy name Matthew. He stay inside da tax place taking money fo da govermen. Jesus tell um, “Come wit me! Be one a my guys!” Matthew wen get up, an wen go wit him.

10.verse: Dat time Jesus go Matthew house fo eat. Plenny tax guys an odda kine peopo dat get bad name jalike dem wen go sit down fo eat wit Jesus an his guys.

11.verse: Da Pharisee guys see dat, an dey aks Jesus guys, “Eh, yoa teacha, how come he eating wit da tax guys an odda kine peopo dat get bad name jalike dem?”

12.verse: Jesus wen hear dat, an he tell um, “Da guys dat not sick no need docta, ony da sick guys need docta.

13.verse: Go figga dis dat Godʼs talka Hosea wen say befo time, ‘I like my peopo give chance to each odda. Dat mo betta den jus make sacrifice inside da temple.’ Dass wat God say. But me, I neva come fo tell da guys dat everytime do wat God say fo come by me fo be my guys, but I wen come fo da peopo dat get bad name.”

14.verse: How Come Jesus Guys No Skip Food So Dey Can Pray? - Had guys, John Da Baptiza Guy was dea teacha. Dey wen come by Jesus, an aks him, “How come us guys skipping food so we can pray, an da Pharisee guys skipping food so dey can pray, but da guys you teaching, dey not skipping food, but still yet dey can pray?”

15.verse: Jesus tell um, “Wat you tink? You go one wedding an hang yoa face an cry wen da guy dat getting married stay dea? Not! Bumbye, da time goin come wen dey goin take away da guy dat getting married, an den, dat time, his friends goin skip food.

16.verse: No Mix Da Old Kine Teaching Wit Da New Kine Teaching - “Fo fix up one old puka clothes, you no goin take one new piece cloth dat no shrink yet fo cover da puka. You do dat, den wen you go wash um, da new piece goin shrink an make one mo big puka, an you make da old clothes mo worse.

17.verse: Same ting, you no goin put grape juice fo make wine inside one old kine leather bag an close um fo let um ferment. You do dat, da new wine goin ferment an bus da old wine bag, an da wine goin spill out. Da old leather no good no moa. Mo betta, you put da grape juice inside one new kine leather bag. Den da wine an da bag stay good.”

18.verse: One Leada Guyʼs Girl An One Wahine - He stay talking to dem, an one leada guy wen go dea an go down in front Jesus, an say, “My girl jus wen mahke. Try come an put yoa hand on top her. Den she goin come back alive.”

19.verse: Jesus wen go wit him, an da guys he teaching wen go too.

20.verse: An you know wat? Ova dea, had one wahine who stay bleeding twelve years. She tink, “If I ony touch Jesus clotheses, I know I goin come good.” Dass why she go behind Jesus, an wen touch his clotheses.

21.verse: An you know wat? Ova dea, had one wahine who stay bleeding twelve years. She tink, “If I ony touch Jesus clotheses, I know I goin come good.” Dass why she go behind Jesus, an wen touch his clotheses.

22.verse: Jesus wen turn aroun, an wen spock her behind him, an he say, “Sista, make strong! You trus me, dass why you come good awready.” Right den an dea she wen come good.

23.verse: Jesus wen come near da leada guyʼs house, an see da guys playing funeral kine music. Everybody stay making big noise an crying plenny.

24.verse: He tell um, “Everybody go way! Da girl neva mahke, she ony sleeping.” But da peopo make fun a him.

25.verse: He send um all outside. He go inside, an take da girlʼs hand, an she wen come back alive.

26.verse: Da peopo all ova da place ova dea hear bout dis.

27.verse: Jesus Make Two Blind Guys See - Jesus wen go way from dea. Had two blind guys go behind Jesus yelling, “Eh, you, dey call you Da Guy dat from King David ohana! Make pity on us, an give us chance!”

28.verse: Wen Jesus go inside his house, da blind guys go inside dea too. Jesus tell um, “Fo real kine, you guys trus me, dat I can make you guys see?” Dey tell him, “Yeah, Mista.”

29.verse: Den he touch dea eyes an say, “Da way you guys trus me, dass how goin be.”

30.verse: An right den an dea dey wen see. Den Jesus tell um strait, “You guys betta not tell nobody notting bout dis.”

31.verse: But dey wen go all ova da place an tell everybody.

32.verse: Jesus Make One Guy Dat No Can Talk Come Good - Da guys dat was blind befo wen go way from dea. An you know wat? Odda guys wen bring one guy by Jesus. Had one bad kine spirit dat wen take ova him, dass why da guy no can talk.

33.verse: Jesus make da bad kine spirit let um go, an den da guy can talk. All da peopo, wen blow dea minds. Dey say, “Us Israel peopo, we neva see dis kine stuff happen befo!”

34.verse: But da Pharisee guys stay telling, “Dis bugga stay tight wit da leada guy fo da bad kine spirits, da Devil, you know. Dass why he can make um let go da peopo!”

35.verse: Jesus Feel Pity Fo Da Peopo - Jesus go aroun all da big an small towns, an he teach inside da Jewish churches. He teach da Good Kine Stuff bout how dey can get God fo dea King, an he make all da sick guys an da guys dat not strong come good.

36.verse: He look all da peopo, an he get love an aloha an pity fo dem, cuz dey all worn out inside an no can help demself. Dey jalike da sheeps dat no mo one sheep farma fo take care dem.

37.verse: So den he tell his guys, “Eh! Da peopo jalike da crop. Get plenny crop fo bring inside, but no mo nuff worka guys fo do um.

38.verse: Dass why you guys gotta aks da boss guy who own da crop fo send da worka guys fo bring um in.”

1.verse: Da Twelve Guys Jesus Send All Ova Da Place - Jesus tell his twelve guys fo come togedda wit him, an he give um da power fo make da bad kine spirits let go da peopo dat dey wen take ova, an fo make all kine sick peopo come good.

2.verse: Dis da twelve guys he send all ova da place: Simon, da one dey name Peter, an Andrew his brudda; James, dass Zebedee boy, an John, dass James brudda;

3.verse: Philip an Bartolomew; Thomas an Matthew, dass da guy befo time dat collect money fo tax fo da govermen; James, dass Alfeus boy, an Taddeus;

4.verse: da odda guy name Simon, he from da Jewish sovereignty guys; an Judas Iscariot, dass da guy dat goin set up Jesus fo mahke bumbye.

5.verse: Wat Da Twelve Guys Suppose to Do - Jesus send da twelve guys all ova, an he tell um, “No go wea da peopo dat not Jews stay, an no go wea da Samaria peopo stay,

6.verse: but go by da peopo from Israel ohana, cuz dey jalike sheeps dat stay lost.

7.verse: An wen you guys go, teach lidis, ‘God, da King from da sky, he stay King hea now.’

8.verse: Make da sick guys come good, make da mahke guys come back alive again, make da lepa guys come good, an make da bad kine spirits let go da peopo. God give you guys plenny, an he no expeck notting back. So den, you guys give plenny too, an you guys no expeck notting back.

9.verse: Gold, o silva, o copper money, no take um wit you guys.

10.verse: No even take one bag fo da trip, o extra clothes, o slippas, o walking stick; cuz da peopo suppose to give da worka guy wat he need.

11.verse: “Wen you guys go inside one big o small town, look fo one guy dea dat da peopo get respeck fo, an stay his place till you go way from dea.

12.verse: Wen you guys go inside da guyʼs house, tell um you dea fo bring aloha.

13.verse: An if dat ohana give you guys respeck, den tell dem you like fo God make dea hearts rest inside. But if dey no give respeck, take back wat you aks God fo do fo dem.

14.verse: If no mo nobody take you guys in, an dey no like hear wat you say, wen you go outa dea, dust da dust from yoa feet, fo show da peopo dea dat God no like, cuz dey no listen.

15.verse: Dass right! An I tell you guys dis too: wen dey stand in front God da Judge, dey goin get mo hard time den da peopo from Sodom town an Gomorrah town, dat time God wen wipe um out.

16.verse: You Guys Goin Suffa Plenny - “You know, I sending you guys out jalike sheeps, an you guys goin go wea da wild wolfs stay. So you guys gotta tink, jalike da snakes, an no hurt nobody, jalike da doves.

17.verse: Watch out fo da guys dat goin set you up in front da main leadas, an goin whip yoa back hard inside da Jewish churches.

18.verse: Dey goin drag you guys in front governas an kings cuz you my guys. Den you guys goin tell wat you know bout me in front dem, an in front da peopos dat not Jews.

19.verse: Wen dey set you guys up lidat, no worry wat you goin say o how you goin say um. Ony say wat yoa Fadda goin tell you right den.

20.verse: Dat time goin be his Spirit talking, not you guys.

21.verse: “One brudda goin set up his own brudda fo mahke, an one fadda his kid, an kids goin fight wit dea mudda an fadda, an dey goin set um up fo mahke.

22.verse: Everybody goin hate you guys cuz you my guys. But da guy dat no give up till pau goin come out okay.

23.verse: “Wen da guys inside one town make you guys suffa, go way from dea, den go one nodda town. Dass right! An I tell you guys dis too: I da Guy Dass Fo Real, an I goin come back befo you guys even can go all da towns Israel side.

24.verse: “Da teacha, he mo importan den da guy learning. Da boss, he mo importan den da worka.

25.verse: Da guy learning goin feel good inside if bumbye he can come jalike his teacha, an da worka guy come jalike his boss. If dey call da head guy inside da house ‘Beelzebul’ o ‘Da Devil,’ den dey goin call his ohana ‘Da Devil Guys’ an even mo worse tings.

26.verse: No Scared Dem - “No scared dem. Da tings dey cover an hide, everybody goin know an see.

27.verse: Wat I telling you guys in da dark, tell um wea get light too. An wat I wispa in yoa ear, stand on top da house an yell um out.

28.verse: No scared da guys dat can make yoa body mahke, but no can make yoa spirit mahke. But you guys betta be scared God. He can make yoa body an yoa spirit get cut off from God inside Hell.

29.verse: Dey sell two sparrow birds in da market fo one penny. But not even one sparrow bird goin fall down from da sky on top da groun if yoa Fadda no like.

30.verse: Yoa Fadda, he even know how much hairs you get on top yoa head!

31.verse: No scared! Cuz God know you guys worth mo den plenny sparrow birds.

32.verse: Da Guy Dat Tell Da Peopo He Know Christ - “If get one guy dat tell in front all da peopo dat he know me, den I goin tell in front my Fadda in da sky dat I know him.

33.verse: But if get one guy dat tell in front da peopo dat he donno me, den I goin tell in front my Fadda in da sky dat I donno him.

34.verse: Not Friends, But Fighting - “No tink dat I come hea to dis world fo make everybody come friends an no fight. I no come fo do dat, but fo make um turn agains each odda.

35.verse: I come an I hea now, an jalike da Bible wen say from befo time, ‘Dat goin make one guy turn agains his fadda, one girl agains her mudda, one daughta-in-law agains her mudda-in-law.

36.verse: You goin get guys dat hate you inside yoa own ohana.’

37.verse: “Whoeva get love fo his fadda o his mudda mo den he get love fo me, not good nuff fo be my guy. An whoeva get love fo his boy o his girl mo den he get love fo me, not good nuff fo be my guy.

38.verse: Da guy dat not ready fo go wit me an be my guy, no matta dey even goin kill um on top one cross, he not good nuff fo be my guy.

39.verse: If bodda you dat you goin mahke, fo shua you goin mahke. But if you like do everyting you do fo me, an no bodda you if you mahke fo dat, den you goin live fo real kine.

40.verse: Da Guys Dat Goin Get Someting Good - “Anybody take you guys in an make friends wit you guys, same guys, dey goin take me in, an I goin make friends wit dem. Anybody take me in an make friends wit me, same guys, dey goin take in da One dat wen send me, an he goin make friends wit dem.

41.verse: Whoeva take in one guy dat talk fo God an make friends wit him, jus cuz he talk fo God, God goin have plenny good kine stuff bumbye in da sky fo dem, jalike dey was Godʼs talka guy too. Whoeva take in one good guy an make friends wit him, jus cuz he one good guy, God goin have plenny good kine stuff bumbye in da sky fo dem, jalike dey was one good guy too.

42.verse: Whoeva give one guy dat I teaching hea even one drink cold water, jus cuz he one guy I stay teaching, no matta he ony one regula guy, I tell you guys fo shua, God goin have plenny good kine stuff bumbye in da sky fo him.”

1.verse: Wen Jesus pau tell his twelve guys wat dey gotta do an wea dey gotta go, he send um all ova da place, an den he go way from ova dea fo go teach inside da odda towns.

2.verse: Da Guys John Da Baptiza Guy Send - Same time, John Da Baptiza Guy, he stay in jail. He hear all da stuff Jesus stay doing. (Jesus was da Christ guy, you know, da Spesho Guy God Wen Send.) So John wen go send his guys fo talk to Jesus.

3.verse: Dey aks him, “Eh, you da guy suppose to come, o wat? O we suppose to wait fo one nodda guy fo come?”

4.verse: Jesus tell um, “Go, tell John wat you guys stay hear an see.

5.verse: Had guys dat no can see, now dey can see. Had guys dat no can walk, now dey can walk. Had lepa guys, now dey no mo sick. Had guys dat no can hear, now dey can hear. Had guys dat was mahke, now dey stay walking aroun. Da peopo dat no mo notting, now dey hear all da Good Kine Stuff From God dat I teaching um.

6.verse: An if da tings I do no bodda you, den you goin feel good inside.”

7.verse: Afta Johnʼs guys wen start fo go way from ova dea, Jesus tell all da peopo bout John. He aks um, “Dat time you guys wen go inside da boonies fo see John, how come you wen go? Fo look da wind blowing da grass? Nah!

8.verse: Den, how come you guys wen go ova dea? Fo look one guy wit fancy kine clotheses? You know wat? Da guys dat wear fancy kine clotheses stay inside da kingʼs palace.

9.verse: If not dat, how come you guys wen go ova dea? Fo look one guy dat talk fo God? Eh, I tell you guys, John, he mo den one guy dat talk fo God.

10.verse: Dis da guy da Bible wen talk bout befo time, dat time God tell his Spesho Guy, ‘Eh! Try listen dis! I goin send my messenja guy befo you. He goin make everyting ready fo you, Befo you come ova dea.’

11.verse: “Dass right! An I like tell you guys dis too: From all da peopo dat wen live befo time, no mo nobody mo importan den John Da Baptiza Guy. But den now, even da mostes small kine guy dat get God fo his King, he mo importan den John.

12.verse: “From da first time John Da Baptiza Guy wen start fo teach till now, da Kingʼs ohana stay coming mo an mo strong. An get guys dat like try beef, fo take um ova.

13.verse: Till John wen show up ova dea, all da guys dat wen talk fo God befo time, an Moses wen he wen write down Godʼs Rules inside da Bible, dey all wen talk bout da Kingʼs ohana.

14.verse: Dis guy John, he da guy dey say goin come, jus like Elijah. You tink you guys can handle dat?

15.verse: Yeah, you know! You guys get ears fo hear, you betta listen!

16.verse: “But peopo nowdays, how dey stay? Dey jalike da kids dat stay sitting inside da open market place, an yelling to dea friends,

17.verse: ‘Eh! Us guys make music fo you guys, But you guys no like dance! Us guys cry, But you guys no come sad fo us!’

18.verse: “Same ting, wen John Da Baptiza Guy show up, he no eat notting so he can pray plenny, an he no drink wine. Dass how come peopo say, ‘Eh, he get one bad kine spirit in charge a him!’

19.verse: Eh, but try go figga dis: Me, I da Guy Dass Fo Real. I eat, I drink, an dey say, ‘You know wat? Dis guy everytime eating an drinking! He friends wit da guys dat collect money fo tax fo da govermen, an da odda kine peopo dat get bad name, jalike dem.’ But eh! you know wat? Da guy who get da smarts from God, da tings he do, goin make proof dat he right.”

20.verse: Da Peopo From Some Towns No Trus Jesus - Den Jesus wen scold da peopo from all da towns wea he wen show his power, cuz dey not sorry fo all da bad kine stuff dey doing, an dey no stop doing um.

21.verse: He say, “Auwe, you guys from Korazin town, an you guys from Betsaida town! Eh, I neva show my power fo da Tyre an Sidon guys like I wen do um fo you guys. If I wen go do dat, awready dem guys wen come sorry from long time an stop doing um, an dey wen show dey shame fo all dat -- dey wen go put on one gunny bag, an go throw ash on top dea head, so everybody know dey sorry.

22.verse: But I telling you guys now, bumbye goin be mo easy fo da Tyre an Sidon guys wen dey gotta stand in front God da Judge, den fo you guys.

23.verse: An you guys from Capernaum town, You tink God goin take you guys up in da sky, o wat? No! Mo like he goin throw you guys down dea inside Hell. Cuz if I wen do awesome stuff wit my power fo da Sodom guys jalike I do fo you guys, still yet Sodom town stay hea.

24.verse: But I telling you guys, bumbye goin be mo easy fo da Sodom guys wen dey stand in front God da Judge, den fo you guys.”

25.verse: Come Ova Hea By Me An Rest - Dat time Jesus say, “God, you my Fadda. You da Boss all ova da sky an da world. Mahalo plenny, eh, cuz you show dis kine stuff to da kids an hide um from da smart guys dat know plenny.

26.verse: Yeah, you my Fadda, an dass how you like um happen.”

27.verse: Den he tell dem, “My Fadda give me everyting, you know. I his Boy, dass why. Nobody know me like my Fadda know me. An nobody know my Fadda fo real kine, ony me, I know him, cuz I his Boy. An da peopo I like show my Fadda, dey can know him fo real kine too.

28.verse: “All you guys dat stay tired from working hard, an stay trying fo handle all da heavy kine stuff dat da Rules say, come! Come ova hea by me. I make you guys rest now.

29.verse: Jalike da oxes get yoke on top dem fo pull da load, you guys put my yoke on top you, an go learn fo do wat I teaching you. I stay gentle an I like take care peopo befo me, so yoa hearts goin rest inside.

30.verse: Cuz my yoke real good, an my load real easy.”

1.verse: Dey Give Jesus Heat Bout Da Rest Day - Had one time, was da Jewish Rest Day, an Jesus an his guys wen walk thru da fields wea dey grow da wheat. His guys was real hungry. Dey wen pick litto bit wheat fo eat.

2.verse: But had Pharisee guys ova dea dat wen see um do dat, an dey tell Jesus, “Eh, how come! Dese guys, you teaching dem, but still yet dey stay doing da kine stuff dey not suppose to do on da Rest Day!”

3.verse: Jesus tell um, “Wot! You guys neva read inside da Bible wat David wen do, da time wen him an his guys was hungry?

4.verse: He go inside Godʼs spesho house, an eat da bread dass spesho fo God. But no can do dat kine, cuz Godʼs Rules say dat ony da priest guys can eat um. But David, he eat um, an he give um to his guys too cuz dey hungry, an dass okay.

5.verse: Wot! You guys neva read inside da Bible how da priest guys inside da temple gotta do tings on da Rest Day dat go agains da Godʼs Rules? But wen dey do um, dey no broke Godʼs Rules.

6.verse: I tell you strait, get one guy ova hea mo importan den dat temple. Dass me!

7.verse: Da Bible say, ‘I like my peopo make good to each odda an give each odda chance. Dat mo betta den jus make sacrifice inside da temple.’ If you guys wen know wat dis mean, den you guys no say dey wen broke Godʼs Rules, cuz dey neva.

8.verse: I da Guy Dass Fo Real. I da one, da boss fo da Rest Day.”

9.verse: Da Guy Wit Da Wasted Hand - Wen Jesus go way, he go inside da Jewish church.

10.verse: An you know wat? Get one guy dea, his hand stay all any kine. Dey aks Jesus, “Stay okay fo make um come good on da Rest Day, o wat?” Dey say dat cuz dey like bus um.

11.verse: He tell um, “If one a you guys get one sheep dat fall down inside one hole on da Rest Day, you goin grab um an pull um out, yeah?

12.verse: You tink one sheep mo importan den one guy? So, az okay fo do good kine stuff on da Rest Day.”

13.verse: Den he tell da guy wit da hand dat stay all any kine, “Stick out yoa hand.” An da guy stick um out, an da hand wen come good, jalike da odda hand.

14.verse: But da Pharisee guys, dey go outside fo make plan togedda how dey goin kill Jesus.

15.verse: Da Guy God Wen Send Fo Work Fo Him - Jesus wen know wat dey talking bout, so he go way from ova dea. Choke peopo go wit him, an he make all da sick peopo come good.

16.verse: He tell dem dey betta not tell da odda guys who him.

17.verse: Wen he do dis, dat make um happen jalike Isaiah wen say. (He da guy dat wen talk fo God long time ago, you know.) He say:

18.verse: “Eh, try listen! Dis da guy dat work fo me. He da guy I wen pick. I get love an aloha fo him, I stay real good inside cuz a him. I goin give him my Spirit, An he goin teach da peopos all ova da world wat stay right.

19.verse: He no goin make argue o yell. Nobody goin hear him talking loud in da street.

20.verse: Da stick dat ready fo broke, he no goin broke um, Da small fire dat ready fo pio, he no goin put um out, Till bumbye he make everybody do how dey suppose to.

21.verse: All da peopos all ova da world goin trus him, Cuz dey goin know who him.”

22.verse: Jesus An Da Bad Kine Spirits - Dey bring one guy dat get one bad kine spirit dat take ova him. Da guy no can see o talk, cuz da spirit no let um. An Jesus make da spirit let go da guy, an make da guy come good, so he can talk an see.

23.verse: Da peopo, blow dea minds, an dey say, “Eh, dis da guy from King David ohana dat da Bible wen talk bout befo time, o wat?”

24.verse: Da Pharisee guys hear dat, an dey say, “Nah! Was Beelzebul, da Devil. He da leada guy fo da bad kine spirits, you know, an he da one wen give dis guy da power fo make da spirit let go da guy, az why!”

25.verse: Jesus wen know wat dey tinking. He tell um, “Da country dat beef each odda, dey ony bus up dea own self. Da town o da ohana dat beef each odda, no can stay strong.

26.verse: If da Devil make his own guys let go da peopo, den he going agains himself. How he goin stay one strong king?

27.verse: If dea boss Beelzebul give me power fo make da bad kine spirits let go da peopo, who give yoa guys dat kine power? Den wat? Yoa own guys goin show dat you guys stay wrong!

28.verse: But if I make da bad kine spirits let go da peopo cuz I get power from Godʼs Spirit, dat show dat God stay King, an he taking ova, ova hea now.

29.verse: How you tink one guy goin go bus inside one big moke house an rip off his stuffs? First, he gotta tie up da moke! Den can steal everyting.

30.verse: If you no stay wit me, den you stay agains me. Da guy dat no work wit me, he ony work agains me.

31.verse: Dass why I telling you guys, God can let peopo go an hemo dea shame fo all da kine bad stuff dey doing, no matta dey talk stink. But if dey talk stink bout Godʼs Good an Spesho Spirit, he no goin let um go an hemo da shame fo dat.

32.verse: I da Guy Dass Fo Real. Whoeva talk agains me, God goin let um go an hemo da shame fo dat. But whoeva talk agains Godʼs Good an Spesho Spirit, God no goin let um go an hemo dea shame fo dat, now o foeva.

33.verse: One Tree an Da Fruit - “You gotta figga lidis: Wen da tree good, den da fruit good. Wen da tree junk, den da fruit junk. Cuz da fruit goin show if da tree stay good o junk.

34.verse: You guys jalike one snake ohana! You guys no good. How you guys goin talk good wen you guys not? Wateva stay inside you guys, goin come outa you guys mout.

35.verse: Da good guy, he good inside, an he do good kine stuff. Da bad guy, he bad inside, an he do bad kine stuff.

36.verse: I tell you guys strait, da day every guy stand in front God da Judge, he gotta tell how come he wen say all da no good stuff he wen say.

37.verse: Cuz from wat you say, da Judge goin let you go, o he goin punish you.”

38.verse: Eh, Show Us Proof! - Some teacha guys dat teach Godʼs Rules, an some Pharisee guys come by him. Dey say, “Eh, Teacha, we like see proof dat you get power!”

39.verse: But he tell um, “Da guys nowdays dat do bad kine stuff an fool aroun behind Godʼs back, dey everytime like see proof, but dey ony goin see one proof jalike Jonah. He da guy dat wen talk fo God long time ago.

40.verse: Jonah wen stay inside one big fish three days an three nites. Same ting, I Da Guy Dass Fo Real, an I goin stay unda da groun three days an three nites lidat.

41.verse: “Da peopo inside Nineveh town goin stand in front God da Judge fo show proof dat da guys dat stay hea nowdays, dey doing bad kine stuff. Cuz da Nineveh peopo wen come sorry fo all da bad kine stuff dey wen do, an stop doing um, wen Jonah wen teach dem. But you guys, neva. An one guy mo importan den Jonah stay hea now. Dass me.

42.verse: “Da queen from Sheba far away da sout side goin stand in front God da Judge an show dat da peopo dat stay hea nowdays, dey doing bad kine stuff. Cuz she wen come from far away fo listen King Solomon an all da smart stuff he wen say. But you guys neva listen. An one guy mo importan den Solomon stay ova hea wit you guys now. Dass me.

43.verse: Da Bad Kine Spirit Come Back - “Wen one bad kine spirit let go one guy, dat spirit go all ova da boonies fo find one place fo rest, but no can find notting.

44.verse: Den he say, ‘Eh, mo betta I go back to da place I wen stay befo.’ Wen he go dea, da guy jalike one place dat stay empty cuz dey wen sweep um an fix um up.

45.verse: Den da bad spirit go get seven mo spirits dat mo worse den him, an dey all go back to da guy, an take um ova one mo time. Da guy who wen get da bad kine spirit come mo worse den befo. Az why hard fo da bad guys nowdays. Dey goin come mo worse den befo.”

46.verse: Jesus Mudda an Bruddas - Wen Jesus stay talking to da peopo, had his mudda an brudda guys ova dea too, standing outside. Dey like talk to him.

47.verse: One guy tell um, “Eh, yoa mudda an yoa bruddas, dey outside, an dey like talk to you.”

48.verse: Jesus tell da guy, “Eh! Who you figga my mudda? Who you figga my bruddas?”

49.verse: Den he poin to da guys he teaching, an he say, “Dese guys, dey my mudda an my bruddas.

50.verse: Cuz whoeva do da tings my Fadda in da sky say, dey my brudda, an my sista, an my mudda.”

1.verse: Da Farma Plant Seed - Same day Jesus go outside da house, an sit down near da lake fo teach.

2.verse: Plenny peopo come aroun him, so he go inside one small boat, an sit down dea. Da peopo, dey stay standing on top da beach.

3.verse: He use plenny stories fo teach um. Dis wat he say, “You guys hear da story bout da farma guy? He go plant seed.

4.verse: He throw da seeds fo plant. Some fall down by da side a da trail, an da birds go eat um up.

5.verse: Some fall down on top da rocks wea ony had litto bit dirt. But dey grow up fast, cuz ony litto bit dirt dea.

6.verse: Wen da sun come up, da plants burn, an dry up, cuz no mo root.

7.verse: Odda seed, dey fall down inside da kine bushes wit kukus. Da bushes wen grow. Dat wen choke da plants.

8.verse: Odda seed, dey fall down inside da good dirt, an dey grow good, an come up plenny. Some seed, dey make thirty times mo seed, some odda seed make sixty times mo seed, an odda even make hundred times mo seed.”

9.verse: Jesus say, “If you guys hear dis, den tink bout um!”

10.verse: How Come Jesus Teach Wit Stories - Da guys Jesus teaching come by him, an say, “How come you use stories fo teach da peopo lidat?”

11.verse: He say, “God let you guys know all da stuff bout how he stay King in da sky. But da odda guys, he no let dem know all dat kine stuff.

12.verse: If you guys undastan all dat kine stuff, den God goin let you know moa, plenny moa. But if you guys no like know all dat stuff, den even da litto bit you know, he goin take um away.

13.verse: Dass why use stories fo I teach um, cuz ‘Dey see, but dey no can see fo real. Dey hear, but dey no can hear fo real. An dey no undastan.

14.verse: Dey ack jalike da guys Isaiah wen talk bout befo time. He say, “You guys goin hear, But you no goin undastan. You guys goin see, But you guys no goin see fo real.

15.verse: Cuz dis peopo get hard head, Dea ears no can hear good, Dey close dea eyes, Cuz dey no like see fo real, Dea ears, dey no like hear fo real kine, Inside dem, dey no like undastan notting. Dey no like change da way dey stay living, So I can make um come good.’ ” Dass wat God say.

16.verse: “But you guys, you stay good inside cuz yoa eyes can see fo real an yoa ears can hear fo real.

17.verse: Dass fo shua. An I like tell you guys dis too: Long time ago plenny guys who wen talk fo God an plenny guys who wen do da right tings like see da stuff you guys see, but neva see um. An dey like hear da stuff you guys hear, but neva hear um.

18.verse: Wat Da Story Mean - “Listen! Dis wat da story bout da farma mean.

19.verse: Any guy hear da stuff bout da King in da sky, an no undastan, da Bad Guy come an take away da stuff dat da guy wen hear dat stay inside him. Dass jalike da seed dat fall down by da trail.

20.verse: Da seed dat fall down on top da rocks, dass jalike one guy dat hear da good kine stuff, an he trus wat God tell him right den an dea, an he stay good inside.

21.verse: But da guy, he no mo root. He stick wit um fo litto wile, but wen da odda guys make him suffa cuz he trus da stuff he wen hear, den he give up.

22.verse: Da seed dat fall down inside da kine bushes wit kukus, dass jalike one guy dat hear wat God say, but bumbye he worry bout all da kine stuff he need hea inside da world. He like come rich, an dat throw him off da track, so all dat stuff choke da stuff God say dat was inside him. He no can do da right tings, jalike one plant inside da kine bushes wit kukus dat no can give wheat.

23.verse: Da seed dat fall down inside da good dirt, dass jalike one guy dat hear wat God say an undastan um. He do da right tings, jalike da good plant dat give wheat. Da good stuff dat guy do, he goin do good stuff hundred times moa, one nodda guy sixty times moa, one nodda guy thirty times moa.”

24.verse: Da Story Bout Da Weeds - Jesus teach da peopo wit anodda story. He say, “Wen God in da sky stay King, dass jalike wen one farma plant good seed inside his field.

25.verse: But wen everybody sleeping, one guy dat stay agains him go ova dea wea da wheat seed stay planted, an plant weeds, an bag.

26.verse: Wen da plants come up an make wheat, same time da weeds come up, but den can tell da weed diffren from da wheat.

27.verse: Da guys dat work fo da owna go by him an tell, ‘Eh boss, da seeds you wen plant inside da field, was good, o wat? How come get weeds?’

28.verse: “He tell um, ‘One guy dat stay agains me wen plant um ova dea.’ “Da worka guys say, ‘You like us go pull out da weeds?’

29.verse: “He say, ‘No, I no like. If you guys do dat, you goin pull out da wheat too.

30.verse: Let um grow togedda till dey stay ready. Den pull out da weeds first, an tie um togedda fo burn. Den cut da wheat, an put um inside da storage place.’ ”

31.verse: Da Mustard Seed Story - Jesus use anodda story fo teach da peopo. He say, “Wen God in da sky stay King, dass jalike one mustard seed. Wen one guy plant da mustard seed inside his field,

32.verse: dat kine seed da mos smalles seed, mo small den all da odda seeds. But wen dat seed grow, da plant come big, mo big den all da odda plants, an come big jalike one tree. Get birds in da sky dat come an make dea nest inside da branches.”

33.verse: Da Yeast Story - Jesus teach da peopo wit anodda story. He say, “Wen God in da sky stay King, dass jalike wen one wahine take yeast an mix um wit plenny dough fo make bread. Bumbye da whole dough goin come mo big, cuz a da yeast.”

34.verse: How Come Jesus Tell Stories Fo Teach - Jesus wen teach plenny peopo plenny stuff wit ony stories. He neva teach um wit odda kine stuffs.

35.verse: He do um lidat fo make um happen jalike da guy who wen talk fo God wen say befo time, “I goin teach um wit stories, I goin tell stuff dat nobody know From dat time wen God make da world till now.”

36.verse: Wat Da Story Bout Da Weeds Mean - Jesus wen go way from da peopo, fo go inside his house. Da guys he stay teaching wen come by him, an say, “Dat story bout da weeds inside da field, wat dat mean?”

37.verse: He say, “Da farma dat plant da good seed, dass me, Da Guy Dass Fo Real.

38.verse: Da field, dass da world. Da good seed, dass da peopo who get God fo dea King. Da weeds, dass da peopo who stick wit da Bad Guy, da Devil.

39.verse: Da guy dat stay agains da farma an plant da bad seed, dass da Devil. Wen da plants stay ready, dass da time wen da world goin pau. Da worka guys, dey da angel guys from da sky.

40.verse: All dat mean, wen dey pull out da weeds an burn um inside da fire, dass jalike goin be wen da world goin pau.

41.verse: I da Guy Dass Fo Real, you know, an I goin send my angel guys all ova da place wea I stay King, fo pull out all da guys dat broke Godʼs Rules an dat wen tell da odda guys fo broke da Rules too.

42.verse: Den dey goin throw um inside wea ony get plenny fire. Dea dey goin cry real hard an grind dea teet cuz dey so huhu an futless.

43.verse: Den da guys dat doing da right tings goin stay wit dea Fadda da King, an be awesome an shine jalike da sun. If you hear dis, make shua you listen.

44.verse: Da Rich Stuff One Guy Bury - “Wen God in da sky stay King, dass jalike had rich kine stuff dat one guy wen bury inside one field. Get one nodda guy dat find um, an den he bury um one mo time. He stay good inside. Den he sell all his stuffs, fo buy dat field.

45.verse: Da Pearl Story - “Wen God in da sky stay King, dass jalike one trader guy dat looking fo good kine pearls.

46.verse: He find one pearl dat cost plenny money. Den he sell all his stuffs, fo buy dat pearl.

47.verse: Da Net Story - “Wen God in da sky stay King, dass jalike wen dey throw one net inside da ocean, an get any kine fish.

48.verse: Wen da net come full, da fisha guys bring um on top da beach. Dey put da good kine fishes inside one bucket, an throw out da rubbish kine fishes.

49.verse: Dass how goin be wen da world goin pau. Da angel guys from da sky goin go all ova da place, an take away da bad guys from da guys dat stay do wat Godʼs Rules say.

50.verse: Dey goin throw da bad guys inside wea ony get fire. Dea dey goin cry real hard an grind dea teet cuz dey so huhu an futless.

51.verse: Da New Kine Stuff An Da Old Kine Stuff - “Eh! You guys undastan all da stuff I telling you?” Dey say, “Yeah, yeah, we undastan.”

52.verse: Jesus tell um, “All da teacha guys dat teach Godʼs Rules, an den go learn how dey can get God inside da sky fo dea King, dey jalike one rich guy dat bring out from his place new kine stuff an old kine stuff too.”

53.verse: Da Nazaret Peopo, Dey No Mo Respeck Fo Jesus - Jesus pau use all dis kine story fo teach. Den he go way from dea.

54.verse: He wen go his own place Nazaret town, an teach inside da Jewish church ova dea. Da peopo, wen blow dea minds, an dey say, “Eh, from wea he get all dese smarts? From wea he get da power fo do all dis awesome kine stuff?

55.verse: Dass da carpenta boy, yeah? His mudda, Mary. An his brudda guys, James, Joseph, Simon, an Judas, yeah?

56.verse: His sistas, dey stay hea wit us. So, from wea he get all dis stuff?”

57.verse: Wen bodda dem, how he stay. But Jesus tell um, “One guy who talk fo God get choke respeck. But he no mo respeck notting inside his own town an his own ohana.”

58.verse: Az why Jesus ony do litto bit awesome stuff ova dea fo show his power, cuz dey no trus him.

1.verse: John Da Baptiza Guy Wen Mahke - Dat time, King Herod hear bout all da stuff Jesus stay doing.

2.verse: He tell his worka guys, “I figga, dis guy gotta be John Da Baptiza. He wen mahke, an now he come back alive. Dass why he get da power fo do all dis awesome kine stuff.”

3.verse: Dis wat wen happen. Befo time, you know, Herod wen tell his guys fo grab John, an put chain on top um, an throw um inside da prison. Herod do dat cuz a Herodias, his brudda Philipʼs wife.

4.verse: Cuz John wen tell him, “Godʼs Rules say, ‘You not suppose to take yoa bruddaʼs wife.’ ”

5.verse: So den, Herod wen like kill him, but den, he scared da peopo, cuz dey all tink John talk fo God.

6.verse: Herod wen go make one big party fo his birfday. Herodias girl wen dance in front everybody, an Herod wen like da dance plenny.

7.verse: He tell her, “Wateva you like, I swear to God I goin give um to you.”

8.verse: Her mudda wen tell her, “Go aks fo John Da Baptiza head on top dis big plate!” So she wen go do wat her mudda say.

9.verse: Da ting she wen aks fo wen bodda King Herod. But he wen swear to God in front all his friends, so he tell his guys, “Go do um.”

10.verse: So den dey wen chop off John Da Baptiza head inside da prison.

11.verse: Dey put his head on top da big plate, an give um to da girl. Den she wen take um to her mudda.

12.verse: Da guys dat John wen teach come an take his body, an bury him. Den dey go tell Jesus wat wen happen.

13.verse: Jesus Feed Five Tousand Guys - Wen Jesus find out wat happen to John, he go inside one boat fo go one place wea nobody stay. Plenny peopo from all da towns aroun dea wen find out wea he wen go, so dey go dea too.

14.verse: Wen Jesus go outa da boat, he spock all da peopo. He get pity fo dem, an he make all da sick guys ova dea come good.

15.verse: Wen da sun stay going down, his guys come by him an say, “Ho ka! Pau hana time awready! An ova hea no mo notting fo eat. Tell da peopo fo go way: Tell um, ‘Go inside da towns, fo buy someting fo eat!’ ”

16.verse: But Jesus tell um, “Nah! Dey no need go way. You guys, you give um someting fo eat.”

17.verse: Dey say, “We no mo notting. Ony get five small breads an two fishes.”

18.verse: He say, “Give um to me.”

19.verse: He tell all da peopo fo sit down on top da grass. An dey sit down. He take da five breads an da two fishes, an look up to da sky, an say, “Eh God! You good heart fo give us guys all dis!” He broke da bread, an give um to his guys, an da guys give good piece bread to all da peopo.

20.verse: Dey all eat an wen come full. His guys pick up twelve big baskets full wit all da lefovas.

21.verse: Had five tousand guys dea dat eat da bread, plus had wahines an kids too.

22.verse: Jesus Walk On Top Da Water - Right den Jesus tell his guys fo go inside da boat, an go da odda side a da lake befo him. He tell all da peopo fo go home.

23.verse: Afta he tell um fo go, he go up on top da mountain fo pray. Wen dark time wen come, he still yet dea by himself.

24.verse: Da boat stay in da middle a da lake, an da wind was blowing real hard agains dem, an da waves stay rocking da boat.

25.verse: Early, early time in da morning, Jesus come by dem, walking on top da water.

26.verse: His guys spock him walking on top da water, an dey come scared an yell, “Eh, get one ghost!”

27.verse: Right den an dea Jesus tell um, “Eh, no scared. Dis ony me! Make strong!”

28.verse: Peter say, “Boss, if dass you, tell me fo go by you on top da water.”

29.verse: Jesus say, “Come, den.” Peter climb outa da boat, an walk on top da water fo go by Jesus.

30.verse: But wen he see how da wind was, he come scared, an start fo go down inside da water. Den he yell, “Eh, Boss! Get me outa dis!”

31.verse: Right den an dea Jesus put out his hand an grab him, an say, “How come you trus me ony litto bit? How come you tink you no can do um?”

32.verse: Wen dey go back inside da boat, da wind pau.

33.verse: Den da guys inside da boat go down in front him, an say, “Wow! Fo real, you Godʼs Boy!”

34.verse: Jesus Make Da Sick Guys Come Good Gennesaret Town - Den dey all go da odda side da lake, an come by Gennesaret town.

35.verse: Da peopo ova dea know who Jesus, an dey run all ova da place fo bring da sick peopo by him.

36.verse: Dey beg him fo let da sick guys touch his clotheses. All da guys dat touch his clotheses wen come good.

1.verse: Wat Da Peopo Teach Long Time Ago - Afta dat, some Pharisee guys an teacha guys dat teach Godʼs Rules wen go from Jerusalem by Jesus, an say,

2.verse: “Eh, no good how dey do, da guys you teaching! How come dey no do wat our ancesta guys wen teach us from long time ago? Dey no wash dea hands da right way befo dey eat.”
