3.verse: Jesus tell um, “Yoa ancesta guys wen teach all kine stuff. How come you do dat kine stuff, but you no do wat Godʼs Rules say?

4.verse: God say, ‘Get respeck fo yoa fadda an mudda.’ An he say dis too, ‘Da guy dat swear at his fadda o mudda, gotta kill him.’

5.verse: “But you teacha guys say, ‘If one guy get someting, an he can use um fo help his fadda o mudda, he can say, “I no goin use um fo help you guys, cuz bumbye I goin give um to da temple.”

6.verse: Den da guy no need show respeck fo his fadda o mudda.’ Dass wat you guys say. You guys make no good wat God wen say, so you can stick wit da stuff yoa ancesta guys wen teach.

7.verse: “You guys say one ting an do anodda! Da guy Isaiah wen talk fo God long time ago, an fo shua he talking bout you guys! He say,

8.verse: ‘God wen say, “Dese guys say dey get respeck fo me, But inside dea heart dey stay far from me.

9.verse: Dey go down an pray to me, But dey ony wase time, Cuz dey no mo love an respeck fo me. Wat dey teach, Dat ony wat da peopo say we gotta do, An not wat God wen say.” ’ ”

10.verse: Wat Make You Pilau Inside - Jesus tell all da peopo, “Come. Listen an try undastan!

11.verse: Wat you guys put inside yoa mout no mean you pilau inside so you no can pray, but wat come outa yoa mout, dat make you pilau inside.”

12.verse: Da guys he teaching come an say, “Eh, you know, da Pharisee guys, dey huhu wit you, cuz dey wen hear wat you wen say.”

13.verse: He tell um, “Dey jalike plants dat my Fadda in da sky neva plant, an he goin pull out anybody dat try make lidat.

14.verse: Foget dem awready! Dey jalike one blind guy going aroun, showing anodda blind guy wea fo go. Bumbye da two blind guys goin fall down inside one hole.”

15.verse: But Peter say, “Try tell us wat you mean bout da stuff going inside da mout.”

16.verse: He say, “Wot! You guys no can undastan still yet?

17.verse: You guys no can figga dis: Wateva go inside da mout, go inside da stomach, an bumbye come out.

18.verse: But wateva come out from da mout, dat come from inside da heart, an dass wat make you pilau inside so you no can pray.

19.verse: Any kine bad kine stuff come out from inside da heart. Dass how everybody figga how dey can do bad kine stuff. Dass why dey kill peopo, dey married an go fool aroun, o dey not married an dey still yet go fool aroun, dey rip off da odda guy, dey bulai bout da odda guy, o dey talk stink.

20.verse: All dat bad kine stuff, dass wat come from inside da heart. Dass why peopo stay pilau inside an dey no can pray. But if get one guy dat no wash his hands da right way, an den he eat, dat no goin make um pilau inside.”

21.verse: One Wahine Trus Jesus - From dea Jesus go Tyre an Sidon side.

22.verse: An you know wat? Get one wahine dea from da Canaan peopo who come an yell, “Boss, you from King David ohana. Pity me an give me chance! My girl get one bad kine spirit dat wen take ova her an make her suffa plenny.”

23.verse: But Jesus neva say notting. Den his guys come an beg him, “Eh, make her go way, cuz she stay following us an yelling.”

24.verse: So Jesus wen tell her, “My Fadda wen send me ony fo help da Israel ohana peopo, cuz dey jalike da sheeps dat stay lost. He neva send me fo help all da odda peopo.”

25.verse: But da wahine go down in front him, an say, “Boss, try help me!”

26.verse: He say, “No good take da food from da kids an throw um down to da dogs.”

27.verse: She say, “Dass right, Boss. But eh, even da dogs unda da table eat wat fall down from da table, yeah?”

28.verse: Jesus tell her, “Eh, sista! You trus me fo real kine! Da way you like, dass how goin be.” An right den an dea, her girl come good.

29.verse: Jesus Make Plenny Peopo Come Good - Jesus hele on from dea, an go by Galilee Lake. He go up one hill an sit down.

30.verse: Plenny peopo come by him, an dey bring da guys dat no can walk, da guys dat no can see, da guys dat no can move da arm o da leg, da guys dat no can talk, an plenny odda guys. Dey bring um wea Jesus stay, an he make um all come good.

31.verse: An all da peopo, wen blow dea minds wen dey see da guys dat no can talk, talk. Da guys dat no can move da arm o da leg, move um. Da guys dat no can walk, walk. Da guys dat no can see, see. Da peopo say, “God do dis! He da same God dat our ancesta guy Israel wen pray to, an he awesome!”

32.verse: Jesus Feed Four Tousand Guys - Jesus tell his guys fo come by him, an he say, “Eh, I get pity fo dese peopo. Dey stay hea wit me three days awready, an dey no mo notting fo eat. I no like send um away hungry, cuz bumbye dey pass out on da way home.”

33.verse: But his guys say, “Eh, we stay hea inside da boonies, you know. An get plenny peopo. Wea we goin find nuff food fo feed um?”

34.verse: But Jesus say, “How much bread you guys get?” Dey tell him, “Seven small bread, an get litto bit fish.”

35.verse: So Jesus tell da peopo fo sit down on top da groun.

36.verse: An he take da seven bread an da fish, an tank God fo um. Den he broke um, an give um to his guys. Dey give um to all da peopo.

37.verse: Dey all wen eat an come full. An Jesus guys pick up da lefovas, seven big baskets full.

38.verse: Had bout four tousand guys dea who wen eat, plus had wahines an kids too.

39.verse: Den he tell um, “Go home, now.” An he climb inside one boat, an go Magadan side.

1.verse: Show Proof! - Da Pharisee guys an da Sadducee guys wen go by Jesus fo try make um look shame wit his own words. Dey say, “Eh! Do someting awesome lidat, so us guys can see da proof dat you come from God in da sky.”

2.verse: He tell um, “Wen da sun going down, you guys say, ‘Goin get good weather, cuz da sky red.’

3.verse: Early morning time, you guys say, ‘Goin get bad weather today, cuz red da sky an get dark clouds.’ You guys know how fo figga da weather from da sky, but you guys no can even figga wat stay happening nowdays.

4.verse: You guys stay doing bad kine stuff, an jalike you stay fooling aroun behind Godʼs back. Dass why you guys telling me you like see proof lidat. You guys no goin see notting. Da same ting jalike wen happen to da guy Jonah, dass da ony proof you guys goin see!” Den Jesus go way from dem.

5.verse: Wat Da Pharisee Guys An Da Sadducee Guys Teach - Jesus guys go come by him ova dea da odda side da lake. But den dey wen foget da food.

6.verse: Jesus tell um, “Watch out! Watch out fo da Pharisee guys an da Sadducee guys! Dey jalike da yeast dat make da bread dough mo bigga.”

7.verse: Jesus guys talking, an trying fo figga out wat he mean. Dey say, “He talking lidat cuz we neva bring da food.”

8.verse: Jesus wen know wat dey talking bout, an he say, “Eh! How come you guys talk bout no mo food? You guys trus me ony litto bit, still yet?

9.verse: You guys no undastan, still yet? Wen I wen broke da five breads fo da five tousand guys, how much baskets you guys wen pick up afta? Tink bout dat.

10.verse: Da seven breads dat wen feed four tousand guys, how much baskets you guys wen pick up afta?

11.verse: How come you guys no undastan dat I no talking bout food? Dass why I say, watch out fo da yeast from da Pharisee guys an da Sadducee guys.”

12.verse: Den dey wen undastan dat he not talking bout da yeast inside da bread. He telling um fo watch out cuz no good da kine stuff da Pharisee guys an da Sadducee guys stay teaching.

13.verse: Wat Peter Say Bout Jesus - Jesus dem stay going Cesarea Philippi side. He aks da guys he teaching, “Eh, I da Guy Dass Fo Real, but who da peopo tink me?”

14.verse: Dey say, “Get guys dat say you John Da Baptiza Guy. An get odda guys dat say you Elijah. Get mo odda guys dat say you Jeremiah, o one nodda guy who wen talk fo God long time ago.”

15.verse: Jesus aks dem, “Kay den, wat bout you guys? Who you tink me fo real kine?”

16.verse: Simon Peter say, “You da Christ Guy, da Spesho Guy God Wen Send. Da God who alive fo real kine, you his Boy.”

17.verse: Jesus say, “Eh, Johnʼs boy! Simon! You can stay good inside cuz you know dat. No mo nobody from dis world wen teach you dat. My Fadda in da sky, he wen teach you dat.

18.verse: I tell you, yoa name Peter, an dat mean ‘Da Rock.’ On top dis rock I goin make my church. Da power dat come from Hell fo kill peopo no goin win ova my church guys.

19.verse: I goin let you take charge da peopo dat get God in da sky fo dea King. If you say bout someting ova hea inside dis world ‘No can,’ den God in da sky goin say ‘No can’ too. An if you say bout someting ova hea inside dis world ‘Dass okay,’ den God in da sky goin say ‘Dass okay’ too.”

20.verse: Den he tell his guys, “Make shua you guys no tell nobody dat I da Christ Guy, da Spesho Guy God Wen Send.”

21.verse: Jesus Say He Goin Mahke An Come Back Alive - Jesus wen start fo show da guys he teaching how he gotta go Jerusalem an suffa plenny ova dea. All da older leada guys, da main priest guys, an da teacha guys dat teach Godʼs Rules, dey da ones dat goin make Jesus suffa, an dey da ones dat goin kill him. But he say he goin come back alive day numba three afta dey kill um.

22.verse: Peter take him on da side an tell him, “Eh! No way, Boss! No way dass goin happen to you!”

23.verse: But Jesus wen turn aroun an tell Peter, “Eh, move outa my way, Devil! You ony trying fo jam me up. Cuz you tink jalike da peopo tink, not jalike God tink.”

24.verse: Jesus tell his guys, “Whoeva like stick wit me, dey gotta make up dea mind dat dey no goin be dea own boss no moa. Goin be hard, jalike dying on top one cross. An den, dey can stick wit me.

25.verse: If bodda you dat you goin mahke, fo shua you goin mahke. But if you like do everyting you do fo me,an no bodda you if you mahke fo dat, den you goin live fo real kine.

26.verse: Dis poho: one guy get everyting inside dis world, but da guy end up cut off from God, an no mo da real kine life inside. You tink you rich nuff fo buy back yoa life?

27.verse: I da Guy Dass Fo Real. I goin come back wit Godʼs angel messenja guys from da sky. Goin be awesome, cuz my Fadda, he awesome. Den I goin pay back everybody fo wat dey wen do, good kine o bad kine.

28.verse: Dass right! An I like tell you guys dis too: I da Guy Dass fo Real, an get some peopo standing ova hea, dat no goin mahke till dey see me come fo be King.”

1.verse: Jesus Look Diffren On Top Da Mountain - Afta six days, Jesus wen take Peter, James, an James brudda John wit him up on top one big mountain wea neva have nobody.

2.verse: Den, da same time dey stay looking at him, Jesus wen start fo look diffren in front dem. His face wen shine jalike da sun, an his clotheses wen come shiny kine jalike one bright light.

3.verse: An you know wat? Right den an dea Moses an Elijah from long time befo wen come outa no wea, an dey stay talking wit Jesus.

4.verse: Den Peter tell Jesus, “You know wat, Boss? Good we stay ova hea! If you like, I goin make shacks ova hea, one fo you, one fo Moses, one fo Elijah.”

5.verse: Peter still talking, an you know wat? Had one bright cloud go ova dem. Den, one voice from inside da cloud say, “Dis my boy! I get plenny love an aloha fo him. I feel real good inside cuz a him. Eh, listen to him!”

6.verse: Da guys hear da voice, an dey come real scared, an dey put dea face on top da groun.

7.verse: Jesus go by dem, an touch um, an say, “Get up! No scared!”

8.verse: Wen dey look up, dey see ony Jesus.

9.verse: Afta dat, Jesus guys stay going down da mountain, an Jesus tell um, “You guys wen see someting real spesho. No tell nobody wat you guys wen see. I Da Guy Dass Fo Real. I goin mahke, an I goin come back alive afta I mahke. Ony dat time, you guys can tell peopo wat you guys wen see.”

10.verse: Jesus guys aks him, “Eh, da teacha guys dat teach da Rules from God, how come dey say Elijah gotta come back first befo Godʼs Spesho Guy goin show up?”

11.verse: He say, “Dass right. Elijah gotta come back first an make everyting ready fo Godʼs Spesho Guy.

12.verse: But I telling you, Elijah wen come back awready, an da peopo neva know who him. Dey even wen make um any kine. An me, da Guy Dass Fo Real, same ting, dey goin make me suffa lidat too.”

13.verse: Den his guys wen figga dat wen he talk bout Elijah coming back, he mean John Da Baptiza Guy.

14.verse: Jesus Throw Out Da Bad Kine Spirit From One Boy - Jesus an his three guys come by choke peopo. One guy from ova dea wen go by him, an go down on his knees. He say,

15.verse: “Boss, try pity my boy! He fall down an start fo shake plenny, an suffa real bad. Plenny times he fall down inside da fire o inside da water.

16.verse: I wen bring um ova hea by da guys you stay teaching, but dey no can make him come good.”

17.verse: Jesus say, “You guys! Nowdays nobody stay trus God! You guys, yoa head, all kapakahi! How much time still I gotta put up wit you guys? Bring da boy ova hea!”

18.verse: Den Jesus talk strong to da bad kine spirit. Den da spirit let go da boy. Right den an dea da boy wen come good.

19.verse: Jesus guys go by him wen neva have nobody, an aks him, “How come we no can throw um out?”

20.verse: He say, “Cuz you guys neva trus God nuff, az why. An I telling you guys dis too: if you guys trus God ony litto bit, jalike da smalles mustard seed, you can tell dis mountain, ‘Go move ova dea,’ an da mountain goin go. No goin get notting dat you guys no can handle.

21.verse: [But ony get one way fo make dis kine bad spirit let peopo go, you know. You gotta skip food so you can pray mo hard.]”

22.verse: One Mo Time Jesus Say He Gotta Mahke An Come Back Alive - Den all Jesus guys wen come togedda wit him, Galilee side, an Jesus wen tell um, “I da Guy Dass Fo Real, you know. But den get peopo dat goin set me up an bus me.

23.verse: Dey goin kill me, an afta dat, day numba three, I goin come back alive.” Dat make Jesus guys come real sad.

24.verse: Jesus Pay Da Tax Fo Da Temple - Den Jesus an his guys go Capernaum town, an da guys who take money fo tax go by Peter an say, “Yoa teacha pay da tax fo da temple, yeah?”

25.verse: He say, “Yeah, he pay um.” Wen Peter go home, Jesus talk first, an say, “Eh Simon! Try tell me wat you tink bout dis: All da kings inside da world, from wea dey take da tax from? From dea own peopo, o from da odda peopos?”

26.verse: He say, “From da odda peopos.” Jesus say, “Den dea own peopo no need pay, yeah?

27.verse: But if us guys no pay um, da tax guys goin tink bad bout us guys. So, go by da lake, an drop one line inside da water. Da first fish you catch, open da mout. You goin find one silva coin inside. Take dat coin to da tax guys. Dat goin be nuff fo me an you.”

1.verse: Who Da Numba One Guy? - One nodda time da guys Jesus teaching come by him, an aks him, “From all da guys dat get God in da sky fo dea King, who da numba one guy?”

2.verse: Jesus tell one small kid fo come, an he put um in front dem.

3.verse: He say, “I tell you guys dis fo shua: If you guys no change an start fo tink jalike one litto kid, no way God in da sky goin be yoa King.

4.verse: Da guy dat no tink he gotta be numba one everytime, jalike dis small kid, dat guy goin come numba one, from dose dat get God in da sky fo dea King.

5.verse: Whoeva take in one small kid jalike dis one, cuz da kid stay tight wit me, same ting, dat guy take me in.”

6.verse: No Good, Make Peopo Do Bad Kine Stuff - Den Jesus say, “Dese small kids hea, dey trus me! If somebody try make um so dey no like trus me no moa, mo betta take one real big heavy stone from da mill, an tie um aroun da guy, den throw him inside da ocean fo drown!

7.verse: “Auwe! Da peopo hea inside da world, dey goin get it! Cuz get guys ova hea who try fo make odda guys do bad kine stuff! Fo shua, goin get peopo dat like make odda guys do bad kine stuff. But auwe! Da guy dat make one nodda guy do bad kine stuff, he goin get it!

8.verse: If yoa hand o yoa leg make you do bad kine stuff, cut um off an throw um away! Mo betta you live to da max foeva, no matta you no mo hand o leg. No good you get da hand an da leg, an dey throw you inside da fire dat stay burning foeva.

9.verse: If yoa eye make you do bad kine stuff, pull um out an throw um away! Mo betta you live foeva wit one eye. No good you get two eyes an dey throw you inside Hell wea get plenny fire.”

10.verse: Da Sheep Dat Stay Lost - Jesus say, “Watch out dat you guys no tink you mo betta den one a dese small kids hea. I tell you guys, dey get spesho angel guys inside da sky dat stay wea dey can talk to my Fadda up dea, any time dey like.

11.verse: How you guys figga wat one farma guy goin do? If he get hundred sheeps, an one sheep stay lost, he goin let da ninety-nine odda sheeps stay ova dea by demself on top da hill, an go look fo da one sheep dat stay lost, yeah? An I tell you dis too: wen he find um, he feel mo good inside fo da one sheep he wen find, den fo da ninety-nine sheeps dat neva get lost. [Me, I Da Guy Dass fo Real. I wen come fo take da guys dat stay lost outa da bad kine stuff dey doing.]

12.verse: How you guys figga wat one farma guy goin do? If he get hundred sheeps, an one sheep stay lost, he goin let da ninety-nine odda sheeps stay ova dea by demself on top da hill, an go look fo da one sheep dat stay lost, yeah? An I tell you dis too: wen he find um, he feel mo good inside fo da one sheep he wen find, den fo da ninety-nine sheeps dat neva get lost. [Me, I Da Guy Dass fo Real. I wen come fo take da guys dat stay lost outa da bad kine stuff dey doing.]

13.verse: How you guys figga wat one farma guy goin do? If he get hundred sheeps, an one sheep stay lost, he goin let da ninety-nine odda sheeps stay ova dea by demself on top da hill, an go look fo da one sheep dat stay lost, yeah? An I tell you dis too: wen he find um, he feel mo good inside fo da one sheep he wen find, den fo da ninety-nine sheeps dat neva get lost. [Me, I Da Guy Dass fo Real. I wen come fo take da guys dat stay lost outa da bad kine stuff dey doing.]

14.verse: Dass why my Fadda in da sky no like if even one a da small kids hea stay lost.”

15.verse: If Yoa Brudda Do Bad Kine Stuff - Jesus say, “If yoa brudda do bad ting to you, go tell him wat he wen do. But go by yoaself. If he listen, den he goin come jalike yoa brudda again.

16.verse: But if he no like listen, take one o two odda guys wit you an tell him one mo time, cuz jalike da Bible wen say from befo time, ‘Fo everyting, need two o three guys fo tell wat dey wen see an hear, so you know fo shua wat wen happen.’

17.verse: If he no like listen to dem, den go tell all da church guys. An if he no like listen to dem, make to him jalike he from one a da peopos dat donno God, o jalike he one crooked guy dat take money fo tax.

18.verse: Wen You Say ‘Can’ o ‘No Can’ - “I tell you guys dis too: If you say ‘No can’ bout someting ova hea inside dis world, God in da sky goin say ‘No can’ too. An if you guys say ‘Dass okay’ bout someting ova hea inside dis world, God in da sky goin say ‘Dass okay’ too.

19.verse: I tell you guys one mo time, if two a you guys inside dis world pray togedda to God fo da same ting, my Fadda in da sky goin make um happen fo you guys.

20.verse: Cuz weaeva two o three guys come togedda cuz dey my guys, I stay right ova dea wit dem.”

21.verse: Da Worka Guy Dat No Like Let Da Odda Guy Go - Den Peter go by Jesus an say, “Eh, Boss, how much times my brudda can do bad tings to me, an I gotta let him go? Seven times, o wat?”

22.verse: Jesus tell him, “No, not ony seven times, but seventy times seven.”

23.verse: Den Jesus say, “Dass how you guys gotta make. Cuz everytime wen God in da sky stay King, dass jalike get one king dat check out wat money his worka guys owe him.

24.verse: He sit down, an dey bring one worka guy by him dat owe um uku paila money.

25.verse: But da worka guy no mo money fo pay him, so da king tell da odda worka guys, ‘Kay den. Go sell da guy fo make him one slave, an sell his wife an his kids too, an everyting he get. Dass how he goin pay wat he owe.’

26.verse: “But dat worka guy go down an beg um. He say, ‘Ah, Boss, try wait! Give me chance! I goin pay you back all da money!’

27.verse: Da king get pity fo him, so he let um go, an tell him, ‘No need pay notting.’

28.verse: “Den dat same worka guy go outside, an spock one nodda worka guy who owe him pay fo four month work. He grab him by da neck, an tell him, ‘Eh! You owe me money! You betta pay me back!’

29.verse: Da odda worka guy go down an beg um, ‘Try wait! Give me chance! I goin pay you back all da money.’

30.verse: “But da first worka guy no like wait, so he tell da guards fo put da odda guy inside da prison till he can pay wat he owe him.

31.verse: “Da odda worka guys see wat wen happen, an dey all bum out. Dey go tell da king everyting dat wen happen.

32.verse: Den da king tell da first worka guy fo come, an say, ‘You so unreal! You one bad worka guy! You wen beg me. I wen let you go, an tell you dat you no need pay me back notting.

33.verse: But how come you no pity da odda guy, jalike I wen pity you an give you chance?’

34.verse: Da king stay real huhu. He give da guy to da guards inside da prison fo torture him, till he pay everyting he owe.”

35.verse: Den Jesus say fo finish, “My Fadda in da sky goin do lidat to all you guys, if you no let yoa brudda go fo real kine inside yoa heart, fo all da bad kine stuff yoa brudda wen do to you.”

1.verse: No Throw Out Yoa Wife - Afta Jesus pau teaching, he go way from Galilee side, an go wea da Judea side start, da odda side a da Jordan River.

2.verse: Had plenny peopo wen go by him, an he wen make da sick guys come good ova dea.

3.verse: Had some Pharisee guys dat wen go by Jesus fo try trap him from wat he goin tell um. Dey aks him, “Inside Godʼs Rules, az right, o wat, fo one guy go throw out his wife fo jus anyting?”

4.verse: He say, “You guys neva read inside da Bible, dat wen God wen make da world, he make one guy, den he make one wahine.

5.verse: An God say, ‘Cuz I wen do dat, da guy no goin stay wit his mudda an fadda no moa, he goin stay wit his wife, an da guy an da wahine goin be jalike one body.’

6.verse: So dey not two peopo no moa, dey one body. Wat God wen put togedda, da peopo betta not broke um up.”

7.verse: Dey aks him, “Den how come Moses wen tell, ‘Fo get one divorce, gotta give da wife one paper, den let her go’?”

8.verse: Jesus tell dem, “Cuz all you guys so hard head, dass why Moses wen let you guys throw out yoa wife. But I telling you guys dis: Wen God wen make da world, dat time no was lidat.

9.verse: An I tell you guys dis too: If one wahine neva go fool aroun, an her husban still yet go throw her out, an den he marry one nodda wahine, da first one still yet stay his wife. Da guy ony fooling aroun da second wahine.”

10.verse: Jesus guys say, “Eh, if dass how stay, mo betta no marry.”

11.verse: But Jesus say, “Everybody no can handle dis, ony da guys God help fo do um, dey can handle.

12.verse: Cuz get guys dat no can marry cuz dey born lidat. An get odda guys dat no can marry cuz peopo wen make um lidat. An get mo odda guys dat no marry cuz dey like ony work fo God, da King inside da sky. Whoeva can handle dis, let him do um.”

13.verse: Jesus Pray Fo Da Small Kids - Da peopo wen bring dea small kids by Jesus, cuz dey like him fo put his hands on top dea heads an pray. Den Jesus guys wen scold um.

14.verse: But den Jesus wen say, “Let da kids come! No stop dem! Cuz da peopo who get God in da sky fo dea King, inside demself dey jus like dese kids.”

15.verse: Den Jesus wen put his hands on top da kids heads, an afta dat, he wen go way.

16.verse: Da Young Guy Dat Get Plenny Stuff‘R’[Kanaka Waiwai] - An you know wat? One guy go by Jesus, an say, “Eh, Teacha! Can aks you one question? Wat good ting I gotta do fo live to da max foeva?”

17.verse: Jesus say, “How come you aks me bout da ‘good ting’? Ony get one Guy dat stay good fo real kine, dass God. If you like live to da max foeva, you know Godʼs Rules. Go do um, den.”

18.verse: Da guy say, “Wat rules?” Jesus say, “No go kill nobody, no go fool aroun behind da oddaʼs back, no rip off nobody, no bulai any kine bout nobody,

19.verse: show respeck fo yoa mudda an fadda, get love fo da odda guy jalike you get love fo yoaself.”

20.verse: Da young guy say, “Ho, Teacha! I do all dat stuff. Wat mo I gotta do?”

21.verse: Jesus tell um, “If you like come perfeck kine, go sell all da stuffs you get, an give da money to da peopo dat no mo notting. Den come wit me fo be my guy. An garans you goin get da real kine rich stuff in da sky.”

22.verse: Da young guy wen hear dat, an he wen come real sad, so dat he wen go way, cuz he get plenny rich stuffs dat he neva like sell.

23.verse: So, Jesus tell his guys, “You see dat? I tell you guys dis too, az why hard fo one rich guy fo get God in da sky fo his King.

24.verse: I telling you guys one mo time, stay mo easy fo one camel go thru da puka inside one needle, den fo one rich guy fo get God in da sky fo his King.”

25.verse: His guys wen hear dat. Wen blow dea minds, an dey say, “Eh, if dass how stay, den who can get outa da bad kine stuff he stay inside?”

26.verse: Jesus look strait at dem, an tell, “No mo nobody dat can do um, but ony God, he da one dat can do um.”

27.verse: Den Peter wen tell, “Eh, Boss, try listen! We wen give up everyting we get fo go wit you. Wat we goin get fo dat?”

28.verse: An Jesus say, “Az right! An I tell you, I da Guy Dass Fo Real. Wen everyting come new, an wen I sit on top my awesome throne, you guys who stay my guys right now, goin sit down on top da twelve thrones an be da judges fo da peopo inside da twelve Israel ohanas.

29.verse: Whoeva give up his home, his bruddas, his sistas, his fadda an mudda, his kids, his land, cuz he know who me, bumbye dey goin get hundred times mo plenny, plus, dey goin live to da max foeva.

30.verse: Goin get plenny guys who make demself come first, but bumbye dey goin come last. An get plenny guys who make demself come last, but bumbye dey goin come first.

1.verse: Da Grape Farm Worka Guys - “I like tell you guys one story bout how stay wen God in da sky stay King. Dass jalike one boss guy dat own one grape farm. Da first ting in da morning da owna go out fo look fo guys dat like work fo him on top his grape farm.

2.verse: He find some guys who say, ‘Yeah, we work fo you fo one day fo one silva denarius coin.’ He tell um, ‘Kay den, go inside my grape farm an work.’

3.verse: “Den he wen go out bout nine clock in da morning. He spock odda guys standing aroun inside da open market, an ony do notting.

4.verse: He tell um, ‘Go work inside my grape farm too, an I pay you guys wateva stay right.’ So dey wen go.

5.verse: Den he go out bout noon time an again bout three clock, an do da same ting.

6.verse: “Bout five clock he go out one mo time, an spock odda guys standing aroun, doing notting. He tell um, ‘How come you guys stay hea all day an ony do notting?’

7.verse: “Dey wen say, ‘Cuz nobody like give us job.’ An he tell um, ‘Den you guys go work inside my grape farm too.’

8.verse: “Wen da sun wen go down, da grape farm owna guy tell da luna, ‘Tell da worka guys fo come, an pay um dea money. Start wit da last guys, all da way to da first guys.’

9.verse: So da guys come first who wen start bout five clock, an da luna pay each guy one silva denarius coin.

10.verse: Wen da first guys dat start early come, dey wen tink dey goin get mo money. But each guy wen get one silva denarius coin too.

11.verse: “Wen dey get dea pay, dey start fo grumble to da boss owna guy.

12.verse: Dey say, ‘Eh, dis not right! Da last guys wen work ony fo one hour, but den you give dem da same pay, jalike you give us. We wen work hard all day, even inside da hot sun!’

13.verse: “But he tell one guy, ‘Eh my friend, I not cheating you. You wen say you goin work fo one day fo one silva denarius coin, yeah?

14.verse: Kay den, take wat you wen work fo, an go home. I like give da last guys da same pay I wen give you.

15.verse: I can do wat I like wit my own money, you know. You jealous cuz I good to dem, o wat?’ ”

16.verse: Den Jesus tell, “Da guys who come last, goin come first, an da guys who come first, goin come last.”

17.verse: One Mo Time Jesus Tell He Goin Mahke - Wen Jesus dem was going Jerusalem town, he wen take his twelve guys by da side a da road by demself, an tell um,

18.verse: “Eh, listen, we going Jerusalem. I da Guy Dass fo Real, you know. One guy goin turn me ova to da main priest guys an da teachas who teach Godʼs Rules. Den dey goin say I gotta mahke.

19.verse: Dey goin turn me ova to da guys dat not Jews. Dey goin play any kine stuff on me, whip me, an den kill me on top one cross. Day numba three afta I mahke, God goin make me come back alive.”

20.verse: One Mudda Aks Jesus Fo Do Someting Fo Her Boys - Den Zebedee boys an dea mudda wen come by Jesus. She go down in front him, cuz she like aks him fo do someting fo her.

21.verse: He tell her, “Wat you like?” She tell him, “Bumbye wen you come King, try let my two boys sit by you, one by yoa right side, an one by yoa left side.”

22.verse: Jesus say, “You donno wat you aksing fo. You tink you guys can suffa jalike I goin suffa?” Dey say, “Yeah, we can handle.”

23.verse: He tell um, “Fo shua you guys goin suffa jalike me. But fo sit by my right side an by my left side bumbye wen I come King, dass not mines fo say. My Fadda, he da One who can say dat, an he awready stay make da spesho places ready fo da guys dat suppose to sit ova dea.”

24.verse: Wen da odda ten guys hear dat, dey come all huhu wit da two bruddas.

25.verse: But Jesus say, “Eh, all you guys! Come ova hea an listen! You know, da leadas fo da peopos dat donno God, dey get any kine power ova dem. Dea main guys get da rights fo tell dem wat fo do.

26.verse: But you guys, no goin be lidat wit you. Wit you guys, whoeva like be da leada, he gotta take care you guys.

27.verse: Wit you guys, whoeva like be numba one, he gotta do wat you guys tell him.

28.verse: I da Guy Dass Fo Real. I neva come so peopo can take care me. I wen come fo take care dem. I wen come fo give up my life an mahke, fo cut loose plenny peopo from da power dat da bad kine stuff get ova dem.”

29.verse: Jesus Make Two Guys Dat No Can See, Come Good - Lata, Jesus dem wen go away from Jericho town, an plenny peopo wen go wit dem.

30.verse: An you know wat? Get two blind guys sitting by da road side. Dey hear dat Jesus going by dem. So dey yell, “Eh, Boss! You da guy dat suppose to show up from King David ohana! Try pity us!”

31.verse: Had choke peopo ova dea dat wen scold dem an tell um fo shut dea mout. But dey wen yell even mo loud, “Eh, Boss, you da guy from King David ohana! Try pity us!”

32.verse: Jesus stop an tell um, “Come ova hea! Wat you guys like me do fo you?”

34.verse: Jesus wen feel pity fo dem down deep inside, an he wen touch dea eyes. Right den an dea, dey can see, an dey wen go wit him.

1.verse: Jesus Go Inside Jerusalem Jalike One King - Den Jesus dem come near Jerusalem an come to Betpage, da small town on top Olive Ridge. Jesus tell two guys he teaching,

2.verse: “You guys know dat town ova dea? Go inside dea. Wen you guys go inside da town, right dea you guys goin find one donkey dat stay tie up, an her baby donkey stay dea too. Hemo da rope from da fence, an bring um ova hea fo me.

3.verse: If somebody aks you guys, ‘Eh, how come you guys stay doing dat?’ tell him, ‘Da Boss need um.’ An right den an dea da guy goin let da donkeys go.”

4.verse: Dat wen happen fo make come true wat da guy who wen talk fo God long time ago wen say,

5.verse: “Go tell da Jerusalem peopo, Zion town, Eh, look! Yoa King stay coming by you, He gentle, He stay riding on top one donkey, Even one baby donkey.”

6.verse: So, Jesus guys wen go do wat he wen tell um.

7.verse: Dey bring da donkey an her baby by Jesus. Dey throw dea coats on top um, an Jesus wen sit on top um.

8.verse: Plenny peopo put dea coats down on top da road too, jalike fo one king. Odda guys cut branches from da trees an put um down on top da road fo show respeck fo Jesus.

9.verse: An plenny guys stay walking in front an behind, yelling, “Hui! God goin take us outa da bad kine stuff we stay in! Dis guy from King David ohana, God goin do plenny good kine stuff fo him. He da guy dat come wit power from da Boss! Da awesome God goin take us outa da bad kine stuff we stay in!”

10.verse: Wen Jesus go inside Jerusalem, all da peopo was amping, an dey aks, “Eh, who dat?”

11.verse: An plenny peopo wen tell um, “Dass da Guy who talk fo God. Az Jesus from Nazaret town, Galilee side.”

12.verse: Jesus Inside Da Temple Yard - Den Jesus wen go inside da temple yard, an he throw out all da guys who was buying an selling stuff ova dea. He wen huli da tables wea dey sell da spesho kine money fo give to da temple, an da stools fo da guys who sell doves fo sacrifice.

13.verse: He tell all dose peopo, “Da Bible say, ‘My temple goin be one house fo pray inside.’ But you guys stay make um jalike one hangout fo crooks!”

14.verse: Den da blind guys an da guys dat no can walk wen go by Jesus inside da temple yard, an he wen make um come good.

15.verse: But da main priest guys an da teachas who teach Godʼs Rules wen see all da awesome stuff Jesus wen do. An dey see all da kids yelling inside da temple yard. Da kids say, “Eh! Garans God goin take us outa all da bad kine stuff we stay in! Eh! Garans da guy from King David ohana!” So da priest guys an da teacha guys wen come huhu.

16.verse: Dey aks Jesus, “Eh, you hear wat dese kids saying? Dass not good!” But Jesus tell um, “Yeah, I hear um. Wassa matta? You guys neva read wat da Bible say? ‘Da babies an da small kids, You let dem tell all da kine good stuff bout you.’ ”

17.verse: Den he go way from dem, an go Betany, da small town outside Jerusalem, an stay ova dea.

18.verse: Da Fig Tree Dat No Mo Fruit - Da nex morning, wen Jesus was going Jerusalem town one mo time, he wen come real hungry.

19.verse: He spock one fig tree by da road. He go ova dea, an ony find leafs, no mo fruit notting. He tell um, “You no goin give fruit no moa!” Right den an dea da fig tree wen go dry up.

20.verse: His guys wen see dat. Dey say, “Wow! Quick da fig tree wen dry up!” Dey no can figga dat.

21.verse: Jesus tell um, “Az right! An I like tell you guys dis too: If you guys trus God to da max, an no trus ony litto bit same time, you goin do jalike I wen do to dis fig tree. You goin even tell dis mountain ova hea, ‘Eh, get up! Throw yoaself inside da ocean,’ an goin be lidat.

22.verse: Wen you guys pray, everyting you aks God fo do, trus um jalike you get um awready, an dat goin be.”

23.verse: Wat Right Jesus Get Fo Do Wat He Do? - Den Jesus go inside da temple yard, an teach da peopo. Da main priest guys an da older leadas fo da peopo wen go by him. Dey aks um, “Wat right you get fo do dis kine stuff? Who wen say you can do um?”

24.verse: Jesus tell um, “I like aks you guys one ting. You tell me, an den I tell you guys wat right I get fo do dis kine stuff.

25.verse: Da guy John, wen he wen baptize, wea he wen get da right? God in da sky, he give um da right? O da peopo, dey give um da right? Try tell me dat.” Da main priest guys wen make argue wit each odda. Dey say, “If we tell him, ‘God in da sky give um da right,’ he goin say, ‘How come you guys neva believe him den?’

26.verse: But if we say, ‘Da peopo give um da right,’ no way! You know, us guys scared wat da peopo goin do, cuz da peopo tink dat John wen talk fo God.”

27.verse: So dey tell him, “Eh, we donno.” Den Jesus say, “Kay den, I no goin tell you guys from wea I get da right.”

28.verse: Da Story Bout Da Two Boys - “Wat you guys tink bout da guy who get two boys? He wen tell da first boy, ‘Eh, boy, go work da grape farm today.’

29.verse: “But he say, ‘No. I not going.’ Afta dat da boy feel sorry, so he go work inside da grape farm.

30.verse: “Da fadda tell da odda boy da same ting, an he say, ‘Yeah, I going.’ But he neva go.

31.verse: How you guys figga? Wat boy wen do wat da fadda like?” Dey tell him, “Da first boy, fo shua.” Den Jesus say, “Dass right! I tell you guys, da guys who collect money fo tax fo da govermen, an da wahines who fool aroun fo money, dey goin get God fo dea King, befo you guys.

32.verse: John Da Baptiza Guy wen teach you guys da right way, an you guys neva believe wat he say. But da tax guys an da wahines who fool aroun fo money, dey wen believe him. You guys wen see dat, an you guys still yet neva come sorry fo all da kine bad stuff you guys wen do an pau do um. No matta you wen see dat dose peopo wen believe him, you guys still yet neva believe him.”

33.verse: Da Guys Dat Rent One Grape Farm - “Listen to one nodda story so you can learn someting. Dis one bout da guy who wen go plant one grape farm. He make one fence aroun um, an dig one hole inside da groun fo squeeze da grapes, an he build one watch tower. Den he wen rent da grape farm to some farma guys. Den he go far away.

34.verse: “Wen time fo cut da grapes, da boss guy send some worka guys fo get his share from da farma guys.

35.verse: But da farma guys wen grab um, an bus up one guy, an kill anodda, an throw stones at da odda worka guy.

36.verse: Da boss send plenny mo worka guys, mo den befo, an da farmas wen do da same ting to dem, jalike da odda workas.

37.verse: “In da end da boss wen send his boy. He say, ‘Eh, dey goin show respeck fo my boy.’

38.verse: “But wen da farma guys spock da boy, dey tell each odda, ‘Eh, dis da guy goin own da farm. Come, we go kill him an take ova da farm.’

39.verse: So dey grab da boy, an throw him outside da farm, an kill him.

40.verse: “Kay den, wen da boss who own da grape farm come, wat you guys tink he goin do to dem?”

41.verse: An da leada guys say, “He goin kill da bad guys, an den he goin rent da field to some odda guys, who goin give him his share wen da time come.”

42.verse: Den Jesus tell um, “You guys neva read inside da Bible, o wat? bout da stone dass jalike me: Had one big stone, Da builda guys was tinking, ‘Poho! Dis stone junk!’ An dey no take um. But dat stone, Dass da corner block. Can make da building strong. Da Boss wen do dis, yeah? An dis awesome!”

43.verse: “I tell you guys, God goin be King fo odda peopos who do good kine stuff jalike he do, but he no goin be king fo yoa peopo no moa.

44.verse: [I da main stone. Da guy who trip an fall down on top dis stone, da stone goin broke him in plenny small pieces. If dis stone fall down on top one guy, da stone goin make him jalike dust.”]

45.verse: Wen da main priest guys an da Pharisee guys hear da stories, dey know Jesus was talking bout dem.

46.verse: An dey like grab him fo put him inside prison. But dey scared da peopo, cuz da peopo wen tink he one guy who talk fo God.

1.verse: Da Wedding Lu‛au Story - One mo time Jesus tell da peopo mo stories fo teach um.

2.verse: He tell um lidis: “Wen God in da sky stay King, dass jalike one king who make one lu‛au cuz his boy goin get married.

3.verse: Wen da time come, he send his worka guys fo tell all da peopo he wen aks fo come, fo come awready. But his friends neva like come.

4.verse: “So den he send some mo odda workas. He tell um, ‘Tell all da peopo I wen aks fo come, “Time awready! I wen kill da cows an da bestes kine baby cows. I wen make all da food ready. Try come!” ’

5.verse: “But da peopo he wen tell fo come, dey no care, an dey go way from da guy. Some guys go back to dea farms, an odda guys go back dea stores fo do dea own business.

6.verse: Had odda guys dat wen grab da worka guys, an dey make any kine to da worka guys, an dey even wen kill da worka guys.

7.verse: “An den da king wen come so wild wit dem, he wen send his army guys, fo kill da guys who wen kill his workas, an den da army guys wen burn up da whole town.

8.verse: Den da king tell his odda worka guys, ‘You know, da lu‛au fo my boy stay ready now, but da guys I wen tell fo come, dey not good nuff.

9.verse: So den I tell you guys, go all da main roads, an tell all da peopo you guys see ova dea fo come da wedding lu‛au.’

10.verse: So da worka guys wen go check out all da roads, an wen bring all da guys dey wen find ova dea fo da lu‛au. Had choke peopo, da good kine guys, an da bad kine guys.

11.verse: “Da king wen go inside fo look da peopo dat wen come ova dea, an he wen spock one guy who neva have wedding kine clotheses.

12.verse: He tell da guy, ‘Eh, how come you wen come inside hea, but you no mo wedding kine clotheses on?’ An da guy neva have notting fo say.

13.verse: So da king tell his worka guys, ‘Eh, tie up dis guyʼs hands an feet, an throw um outside inside da dark. Ova dea goin get peopo dat goin cry real hard an grind dea teet cuz dey so huhu an futless.’

14.verse: I tell you, God da King tell plenny guys fo come, but ony goin get litto bit guys he goin pick fo be his own guys.”

15.verse: Da Tax Money Fo King Cesar - Den da Pharisee guys wen start talking togedda how dey goin catch Jesus from wat he goin tell um.

16.verse: So den dey wen send da guys dey teaching fo go by him, an some King Herod guys too. Dey say, “Eh, Teacha, we know you tell da trut, an you teach da true kine stuff bout wat God like everybody fo do, no matta wat da peopo tink o who dem.

17.verse: So, wat? Godʼs Rules say, az right fo pay King Cesar da tax money, o wat?”

18.verse: But Jesus know dey trying fo make um any kine, an he say, “You guys, you say one ting an do one nodda! How come you guys trying fo make me say any kine?

19.verse: Show me da kine coin fo da tax.” An dey wen show him.

20.verse: Jesus say, “Who dis guy on top da coin? An wass his name?”

21.verse: Dey say, “Dass King Cesar.” An he tell um, “Kay den, give um to Cesar, wat his, an give to God, wat his!”

22.verse: Wen dey hear dat, wen blow dea minds, an dey wen go way from dea.

23.verse: Dey Aks If Peopo Goin Come Back Alive Again - Dat same day had some Sadducee guys dat wen go by Jesus. Dis how dey teach: If you mahke, you mahke, you no goin come back alive again.

24.verse: So dey aks him, “Eh, Teacha! Da guy Moses who wen give us Godʼs Rules, he wen say, ‘Wen one guy mahke an he no mo kids, his brudda gotta marry da wife, an make kids fo carry da name fo da brudda who wen mahke.’

25.verse: “Now den, had seven bruddas ova hea by us. Da oldes brudda wen marry one wahine, den wen mahke, but neva have kids. (Dat mean da wahine goin be his nex bruddaʼs wife.)

26.verse: Da nex brudda wen marry her, an den he wen mahke, an neva have kids. Da same ting wen happen to da nex brudda. An dis same ting wen happen wit all da odda bruddas. An all dem guys neva have kids notting.

27.verse: Den afta dat, da wahine wen mahke too.

28.verse: “So, wen da time come wen all da peopo dat wen mahke come back alive, den who goin be her husban? Cuz dey all wen marry her.”

29.verse: Jesus tell um, “Eh, you guys all jam up, you know. Cuz you donno wat da Bible say from befo time, az why, an you donno Godʼs power.

30.verse: Wen da guys dat wen mahke come back alive again, dey goin be jalike da angel messenja guys in da sky; dat time dey no marry.

31.verse: Wot! You guys neva read inside da Bible wat God wen tell you bout da guys who goin come back alive afta dey mahke?

32.verse: God say, ‘I da God dat fo Abraham, an fo Isaac, an fo Jacob.’ So I telling you guys, he not da God fo da mahke guys dat no mo spirit inside dem. He da God fo da guys like Abraham an Isaac an Jacob, dat get one spirit inside dem dat stay alive, no matta dea body wen mahke.”

33.verse: All da peopo wen hear him teach dat, an wen blow dea minds.

34.verse: Da Main Rule - Wen da Pharisee guys wen hear dat he wen shut up da Sadducee guys, den all a dem wen go by Jesus.

35.verse: One teacha who teach Godʼs Rules wen aks him one question fo try catch um.

36.verse: He say, “Eh, Teacha, from all da Rules God wen give us, which one da main one?”

37.verse: Jesus tell um, “Get love an aloha fo da Boss yoa God, wit all yoa heart, an wit everyting inside you, an wit how you tink.

38.verse: Dis da first an mos importan Rule God wen give us.

39.verse: An da nex Rule jalike dat one: ‘Get love an aloha fo da odda guy jalike you get love an aloha fo yoaself.’

40.verse: All Godʼs Rules, an everyting da guys who wen talk fo God wen say, come from dese two Rules.”

41.verse: Da Spesho Guy God Wen Send, Whose Boy Him? - Dat time too, da Pharisee guys come togedda by Jesus, an Jesus aks um,

42.verse: “Wat you guys tink? Da Spesho Guy God Wen Send, whose boy him?” Dey say, “He from King Davidʼs ohana.”

43.verse: Jesus say, “Den how come Godʼs Spirit wen tell King David fo call Godʼs Spesho Guy ‘Boss’? Cuz David wen say,

44.verse: ‘Da Boss, He tell my Boss, “Come ova hea, sit down! Dis da importan place by my right side. Bumbye I goin make da peopo dat go agains you Go down in front you, Fo show dat you da winna ova dem.” ’

45.verse: “Kay den. David call Godʼs Spesho Guy ‘Boss,’ yeah? Den how he can be Davidʼs boy, same time?”

46.verse: An da Pharisee guys neva have notting fo say. From dat time, everybody scared fo aks him odda questions.

1.verse: Da Guys Dat Teach Godʼs Rules An Da Pharisee Guys - Afta dat Jesus tell all da peopo an da guys he teaching,

2.verse: “Da teachas who teach Godʼs Rules, an da Pharisee guys, dey get da same job jalike Moses had, cuz dey tell everybody wat fo do.

3.verse: So you guys betta do everyting dey tell you guys. But no do jalike dey do. Cuz dey no do da same ting dat dey teach.

4.verse: Wat dey teach, jalike dey stay pile up big heavy kine stuffs on top peopoʼs shouldas, dat real hard fo carry. But dey even no like help da peopo wit dea small finga notting.

5.verse: Everyting dey do, dey ony do um so dey can make demself look good in front da peopo. Dey go aroun an show off stuff da Bible say on top dea heads an arms, an make um look real nice wit real fancy kine religious kine clotheses.

6.verse: Dey like sit inside da main place at da lu‛au, an on top da main place inside da Jewish churches.

7.verse: Dey like da peopo fo talk to dem wit respeck inside da open market, an fo call um ‘Teacha.’

8.verse: “But you guys, no let da peopo call you guys ‘Teacha.’ Cuz you guys get ony one Teacha, da Spesho Guy God Wen Send, an you guys stay brudda-brudda.

9.verse: No call nobody inside da world yoa ‘Fadda,’ cuz you guys get ony one Fadda, an he stay in da sky.

10.verse: No let dem call you ‘Boss,’ cuz you guys get ony one Boss. Dass me, da Spesho Guy God Wen Send.

11.verse: Wit you guys, whoeva yoa leada, he goin help all da odda guys jalike he one worka.

12.verse: Whoeva make himself big, God goin make um small. An whoeva make himself small, God goin make him big.”

13.verse: Da Guys Dat Say One Ting An Do Anodda - Den Jesus say, “Auwe! You teacha guys who teach Godʼs Rules an you Pharisee guys, you guys goin get it! You guys say one ting an do anodda. You guys shut da door so da peopo no can get God in da sky fo dea King. But you guys no like get him fo yoa King too. An you guys no let da peopo who like get God fo dea King, get um.

14.verse: “Auwe! You teacha guys who teach Godʼs Rules an you Pharisee guys, you guys goin get it! You guys say one ting an do anodda. You guys no mo shame fo trick da widows an take away dea house, an same time you guys praying, saying plenny stuff, so nobody tink you guys ripping off da widows. God goin get you guys mo den da odda guys.

15.verse: “Auwe! You teacha guys who teach Godʼs Rules an you Pharisee guys, you guys goin get it! You guys say one ting an do anodda. You guys go all ova da ocean an all ova da land fo find one guy who not one Jew, so you guys can make um come one Jew. But afta he come one Jew, you guys make him two times mo worse den you guys, so he going Hell jalike you guys.

16.verse: “Auwe! You guys goin get it! You guys no can see notting, but you guys try fo show da odda guys wea fo go. You guys say, ‘If one guy swear to God he goin do someting, an he say, “I swear by da temple,” he no need do wat he say. But if he swear to God an he say, “I swear by da gold inside da temple,” he gotta do um.’

17.verse: Wot! You guys not tinking! You guys no can see notting! You guys tink da gold inside da temple mo importan den da temple dat make da gold spesho fo God? No way!

18.verse: “An you guys say, ‘Whoeva swear to God dat he goin do someting, an he say, “I swear by da altar inside da temple,” he no need do wat he say. But whoeva swear to God, an he say, “I swear by da gif offering on top da altar,” dat guy gotta do um.’

19.verse: Wot! You guys not tinking! You guys no can see notting! You guys tink da gif offering on top da altar mo importan den da altar dat make da gif offering spesho fo God? No way!

20.verse: “Whoeva swear to God an say, ‘I swear by da altar,’ he swear to God by all da gifs on top da altar too.

21.verse: Whoeva swear to God an say, ‘I swear by da temple,’ he swear by da God dat stay inside da temple.

22.verse: Whoeva swear to God an say, ‘I swear by da sky,’ dass Godʼs throne, an God stay sit ova dea. So, if he swear to God ‘by da sky,’ den he swear by God.

23.verse: “Auwe! You teacha guys who teach Godʼs Rules an you Pharisee guys, you guys goin get it! You guys say one ting an do anodda. You guys give God ten percent from da spice, like da mint, da dill kine spice, an da cummin spice. But you guys no do da main stuff Godʼs Rules say. You guys no make right to da odda guys. You guys no give um chance. Dey no can trus you guys. Dass da main ting. Do dat stuff jalike you guys suppose to, an no foget da ten percent too.

24.verse: You guys no can see notting, an you guys try fo show da odda guys wea fo go! You guys pick out one small fly from inside da soup, but den jalike you guys let one big camel stay inside da soup, an you swallow da whole ting!

25.verse: “Auwe! You teacha guys who teach Godʼs Rules an you Pharisee guys, you guys goin get it! You guys say one ting an do anodda! Jalike you guys clean da cup an da plate on da outside, but inside get plenny stuff you guys wen rip off from da odda peopo, an you guys stash um fo yoaself!

26.verse: You blind Pharisee guys! Go clean yoa cup an plate inside first, den da outside goin be clean too.

27.verse: “Auwe! You teacha guys who teach Godʼs Rules an you Pharisee guys, you guys goin get it! You guys say one ting an do anodda! You guys jus like da tomb dey wen paint white so look good outside, but inside get ony mahke guy bones an all kine pilau stuff.

28.verse: On da outside, you guys make jalike you doing da right kine stuff, an peopo tink you guys stay doing um, but inside, you guys everytime say one ting an do anodda, an you guys stay broke Godʼs Rules.

29.verse: God Goin Punish Dem Cuz Dey Say One Ting An Do Anodda - “Auwe! You teacha guys who teach Godʼs Rules an you Pharisee guys, you guys goin get it! You guys say one ting an do anodda! You guys make big tombs fo da guys who wen talk fo God, an fix up da tombs fo da guys who wen everytime do da right ting.

30.verse: Same time, you guys say, ‘If we was dea wen our ancesta guys was living, we neva help dem kill da guys who wen talk fo God.’

31.verse: Wen you guys say dat, you guys show dat you jalike dem killa guys -- you guys dea kids!

32.verse: So go finish wat yoa ancesta guys wen start!

33.verse: You guys jalike snakes, an you guys come from one snake ohana! You guys tink God da Judge goin let you guys go? No way! You tink you guys not going Hell? No way!

34.verse: “So, fo shua I goin send guys by you guys who goin talk fo God, an smart guys, an guys who goin teach Godʼs Rules. But you goin kill some a da guys, an some guys you guys goin kill on top crosses, an mo odda guys you guys goin whip hard inside da Jewish churches, an you guys goin make um suffa from one town to anodda town.

35.verse: God goin punish you guys fo all da guys yoa ancesta guys wen kill. Dey wen kill any kine guys who wen everytime do wat dey suppose to, starting from Abel all da way to Zekariah, he Barakiahʼs boy. He da guy yoa ancesta guys wen kill right inside da temple yard, wit Godʼs spesho place on one side an da altar on da odda side.

36.verse: Dass right! An I like tell you guys dis too: you guys who stay live now goin suffa, cuz a all dis stuff dat wen happen befo.

37.verse: Jesus Get Love An Aloha Fo All Da Peopo Inside Jerusalem - “O auwe! You Jerusalem peopo! You guys stay kill da guys who talk fo God, an throw stones fo kill da guys God send by you guys. Plenny times I wen like bring you guys by me, jalike one mudda chicken bring togedda her baby chickens unda her wings, but you guys no like come.

38.verse: You know wat? Everyting stay all poho fo you guys awready!

39.verse: I tell you guys, you guys no goin see me again till you say, ‘Dis guy come wit power from da Boss Up Dea Inside Da Sky. We like God do plenny good tings fo him!’ ”

1.verse: Jesus Say, “Da Temple, Dey Goin Bus Um Up” - Jesus was going outside from da temple yard, an his guys come an say, “Eh, Teacha, check out da buildings ova hea! Ho ka! Awesome, yeah?”

2.verse: Jesus say, “Eh, az right! An I like tell you guys dis too: You know all dis stuff? Bumbye no goin get one stone on top da odda ova hea. Goin be all throw down from how dey stay.”

3.verse: Peopo Goin Suffa - Den bumbye, Jesus wen go Olive Ridge an sit down ova dea. Wen no mo odda guys dea, his guys go by him. Dey aks him, “Wat time all dat kine stuff goin happen? An wat kine ting goin happen fo show us wen you goin come back ova hea, an wen da world goin pau?”

4.verse: Jesus tell um, “Watch out! No let nobody fool you guys!

5.verse: Plenny guys goin show up an try ack jalike dey me. Dey goin say, ‘Eh, me, I dat Spesho Christ Guy From God!’ An dey goin fool plenny peopo lidat.

6.verse: You guys goin hear da war dat stay by us guys, an you guys goin hear bout da wars dat stay all ova da odda places. No freak out. All dat kine stuff gotta happen, but dat no goin mean everyting goin pau yet.

7.verse: Goin get fighting. One country goin start fight one nodda country. One king goin fight one nodda king. Plenny peopo goin get notting fo eat. Plenny diffren places, da groun goin shake hard plenny.

8.verse: Peopo goin suffa plenny, but all dat, ony fo start.

9.verse: “Dat time, dey goin set you guys up an make you guys suffa, an dey goin kill you guys. All da diffren kine peopos all ova da world goin hate you guys cuz you stay my guys.

10.verse: Den, goin get plenny guys dat goin stop trussing me, cuz dey no can handle wat stay happening. An dey goin hate each odda an set up dea own bruddas.

11.verse: Goin get plenny guys dat goin show up an say dey hea fo talk fo God, but dey ony bulai, an dey goin fool plenny peopo.

12.verse: Goin get mo an mo peopo dat goin everytime broke Godʼs Rules mo an moa, az why plenny peopo no goin get aloha fo each odda no moa.

13.verse: But whoeva can handle an hang in dea till all dis pau, dey da ones dat goin come out okay.

14.verse: All ova da world goin get peopo dat goin tell all da Good Kine Stuff bout how peopo can get God fo dea King. All da diffren kine peopos goin hear wass fo real, an den, everyting goin pau.

15.verse: Someting Real Bad Goin Mess Up Everyting - “Daniel, da guy dat wen talk fo God befo time, he wen say dat someting dat God hate plenny, goin happen. Dat ting so bad, goin mess up everyting an make everybody jus bag. Da ting goin stand inside da place dat stay spesho fo God. (Whoeva read dis, dey gotta figga um out.)

16.verse: You know, wen you guys see dat happen, if you stay Judea side, go run to da mountains.

17.verse: If you stay on top one house dat get flat roof, no go inside fo take yoa stuffs wit you.

18.verse: If you stay inside da fields, no go home fo get yoa clotheses.

19.verse: Dat time, goin get hard time fo da hapai wahines an da muddas dat stay nursing dea babies!

20.verse: “Aks God fo no let dis stuff happen winta time o on da Rest Day.

21.verse: Cuz dat time everybody goin choken suffa to da max. Neva have notting lidat eva wen happen befo, not even from wen God wen make da world till now, an no goin get notting lidat eva goin happen again.

22.verse: But God goin make dat time mo short, so goin get peopo dat goin come out okay. Da Boss like help da peopo he wen pick, dass why he goin make dat suffa plenny time mo short.

23.verse: “Dat time, if get one guy dat tell you guys, ‘Eh, look! Christ, da Spesho Guy God Wen Send, he stay ova hea!’ o ‘He stay ova dea!’ no go trus dat kine guy!

24.verse: Goin get plenny fake kine guys who say dey Christ, an goin get plenny fake kine guys who say dey talk fo God. Dey goin do unreal an awesome stuff fo try show proof dat dey fo real, an dey goin even try fool da peopo dat God wen pick.

25.verse: “Eh! Befo all dat happen, I stay telling you guys everyting now awready.

26.verse: If some guys say, ‘Eh! Christ stay inside da boonies!’ no go ova dea. If dey say, ‘Eh! He stay inside dat house ova dea!’ no trus um notting.

27.verse: I da Guy Dass fo Real, an wen I come back, goin be jalike wen da lightning come from da east side an shine all ova to da west side.

28.verse: Wen dat happen, you guys goin know wea I stay. Jalike everybody know wea get someting mahke wen da scavenja birds come togedda ova dea.

29.verse: Da Guy Dass Fo Real Goin Come Back - “Right afta dat time fo suffa plenny, dis wat goin happen: ‘Da sun goin come black. Da moon no goin shine. Da stars goin fall down from da sky. An all da spirits inside da sky dat get plenny power, Dey goin come all kapakahi.’

30.verse: “I da Guy Dass Fo Real. Dat time, da peopo goin see someting up dea inside da sky dat goin show dem dat I stay coming. An all da diffren kine peopos all ova da world goin cry hard an be real sad. Den dey goin spock me, da Guy Dass Fo Real. I coming on top da clouds inside da sky. I goin come wit power an I goin be awesome!

31.verse: Da trumpet goin make big noise, an I goin send my angel messenja guys fo bring togedda all da peopo dat God wen pick from all ova da world, every place dat get undaneat da sky.

32.verse: Da Fig Tree Teach Us Someting - “Eh you guys, try learn someting from da fig tree. Wen da fig tree make new branch an get new leaf, you guys goin know dat summa time stay coming.

33.verse: Same ting, wen you guys see all dis stuff happen, den you goin know, I stay coming an everyting stay ready.

34.verse: Dass right! An I tell you guys dis too: From da peopo dat stay ova hea right now, get guys dat no goin mahke befo all dis stuff goin happen.

35.verse: Da world an da sky goin pau, but da tings I say no goin pau, eva.

36.verse: Nobody Know Da Day O Da Time Dat Goin Happen - “Nobody know wen all dat goin happen, not even da day o da time. Da angel guys inside da sky, even dem, dey donno. Even me, I Godʼs Boy, an I donno da time. Ony my Fadda know da time!

37.verse: “I da Guy Dass Fo Real. Wen I come back, everyting goin be jalike befo time wen da guy Noah wen stay.

38.verse: Dat time, befo da big water wen come, everybody was eating an drinking. Dey was getting married an giving dea girls fo get married. Dey still was doing dat till da time wen Noah wen go inside da big boat.

39.verse: Da odda peopo, dey neva know wat was goin happen, till da big water wen come an wipe um out. You know, I da Guy Dass Fo Real, an wen I come back, goin be same ting lidat.

40.verse: “Goin get two guys working inside one field. God goin take one guy, an he no goin take da odda guy.

41.verse: Goin get two wahines working togedda fo make flour fo bread wit one grinding stone. God goin take one wahine, an he no goin take da odda.

42.verse: “So, watch out! Cuz you guys donno wat time yoa Boss goin come back.

43.verse: But you guys gotta figga dis: If da head guy inside da house wen know wat time da steala guy goin come, he goin watch out fo um. He no goin let um inside fo bus up his place.

44.verse: Az why you guys betta be ready, cuz I da Guy Dass Fo Real. Da time you guys tink I no goin come, dass wen I goin come.

45.verse: Da Worka Guy Da Boss Can Trus - “So den, good fo be jalike one worka guy dat da boss can trus cuz da guy tink plenny how fo do tings right. He da guy, da boss goin make him da luna in charge a his house an his ohana, so he can give everybody dea food wen da right time stay.

46.verse: Wen da boss come back, da worka guy goin stay good inside if he stay doing jalike his boss wen tell him.

47.verse: Dass right! An I tell you guys dis too: Da boss goin put dat guy in charge a everyting he get.

48.verse: “But if dat worka guy do bad kine stuff, den he goin tink, ‘Eh, long time my boss no goin come back.’

49.verse: An he goin start fo bus up da odda worka guys, an he goin eat an drink wit all da odda drunk guys.

50.verse: Den goin get one time, da boss goin come back an da worka tink he still yet not coming, an donno wat time he stay coming.

51.verse: Den da boss goin bus him up, an throw him outside wit da bulaia kine guys who say one ting an do anodda. Ova dea da guys goin cry real hard an grind dea teet cuz dey so huhu an futless.”

1.verse: Ten Girls An Da Wedding - “Dat time, wen God in da sky stay King, goin be jalike dis: Had one wedding. Ten a da wahineʼs girl friends wen take dea olive oil lamps an go dea friendʼs house fo wait fo da groom.

2.verse: Five a dem smart, cuz dey tinking, an da odda five no tink notting.

3.verse: Da girls dat no tink, dey take dea lamps, but den, dey no take olive oil wit dem fo burn.

4.verse: Da girls dat tink, dey take dea lamps, an dey take plenny olive oil wit dem.

5.verse: But da groom neva come yet, an all da girls like go sleep.

6.verse: Midnite, somebody wen yell, ‘Eh! Da groom coming! Come outside fo meet him!’

7.verse: “All da girls wen get up fo make dea lamps ready.

8.verse: Da girls dat no tink wen tell da odda girls, ‘Eh, you guys get olive oil. Try give us some! Da fire stay inside our lamps, goin pio.’

9.verse: “Da smart girls say, ‘No can! No mo nuff fo everybody, jus us. Eh, go buy from da guys dat sell um.’

10.verse: Afta dey wen go fo buy some mo olive oil, da groom wen come ova dea. Da girls who was ready, dey wen go wit him to da wedding party. An dey wen shut da door.

11.verse: “Bumbye, da odda girls wen come. Dey say, ‘Eh, Mista, open da door fo us!’

12.verse: “But da guy tell um, ‘No can! Cuz I donno you guys.’ ”

13.verse: Den Jesus say, “Eh! Az why I telling you guys, watch an stay ready, cuz you guys donno da day o da time, wen me, da Guy Dass fo Real, goin come back, you know.”

14.verse: Three Worka Guys An Da Money - Jesus tell um, “Dat time wen God stay King, goin be jalike dis: Had one guy, he was going on one trip to one far place. Befo he go, he tell his worka guys, ‘Come. I like you guys take care all my stuffs fo me.’

15.verse: He put one guy in charge a five bag money, one nodda guy two bag money, an one nodda guy one bag money, cuz he know how much each guy can handle. Den he go way.

16.verse: Da guy who wen get da five bag money wen go use um fo make business, an wen get five mo bag money.

17.verse: Da guy who get da two bag money wen do da same ting an wen get two mo bag money.

18.verse: But da guy who wen get da one bag money wen dig one hole, an wen put um inside da groun, an wen hide da bossʼs money inside.

19.verse: “Long time afta, da boss wen come back. He wen go check out how da worka guys wen handle all his money.

20.verse: Da guy who wen get da five bag money wen bring five bag mo to da boss. He say, ‘Boss, you wen give me five bag money. Eh, try look! I wen make five mo bag money.’

21.verse: “Da boss say, ‘Eh good! You wen do good. I can trus you. You wen do good wit ony litto bit. I goin put you in charge a plenny stuff. Come. Stay wit me. I stay good inside, same ting, az wat I like you feel.’

22.verse: “Den da guy wit da two bag money wen come an say, ‘Boss, you wen give me two bag money. Look, I wen make two mo bag money.’

23.verse: “Da boss say, ‘Eh good! You wen do good. I can trus you. You wen do good wit ony litto bit. I goin put you in charge a plenny stuff. Come. Stay wit me. I stay good inside, same ting, az wat I like you feel.’

24.verse: “Den da guy wit ony one bag money wen come an say, ‘Boss, I know you one hard guy who no fool aroun. You cut da crop wea you neva plant, an you go get da wheat wea you neva throw seed.

25.verse: An den, I was real scared, an I wen hide yoa money inside one hole undaneat da groun. Hea, yoa money, still yet stay all safe.’

26.verse: “Den da boss say, ‘Auwe! You one real poho worka! You one lazy bugga! You know I like cut da crop wea I neva plant, an I like go get da wheat wea I neva throw seed.

27.verse: Cuz you wen know all dat, how come you neva put my money inside da bank, so dat wen I come back, I can get my money back, an da interes too.

28.verse: Eh, you guys ova dea, take away da money from dis guy an give um to da guy wit da ten bag money.’

29.verse: “Cuz everybody who get stuff goin get mo plenny. But da guy who no mo notting, even da litto bit he get, goin lose um.

30.verse: Go throw dis poho worka guy outside dea inside da dark. Ova dea dey goin cry real hard an grind dea teet cuz dey so huhu an futless.”

31.verse: Everybody Goin Stand In Front God Da Judge - Jesus tell um, “You know, I da Guy Who Fo Real. Wen I come back, I goin be awesome. All da angel guys goin come wit me. Den I goin sit down on top my throne dat stay awesome.

32.verse: All da diffren kine peopos from all ova da world goin come togedda in front me, an I goin put some on one side an some on da odda, jalike one sheep farma guy put da sheeps on one side an da goats on da odda side.

33.verse: Same ting, I goin put da guys dat stay do da right ting on my right side an da odda guys on my left side.

34.verse: “I da King, you know. Dat time I goin tell da guys on my right side, ‘Come ova hea! My Fadda like do plenny good kine stuff fo you guys an give you guys everyting you guys need. You know, wen he wen make da world, he wen make all dis stuff ready fo you guys, cuz I goin be yoa King. So, all dis fo you guys. Take um awready!’

35.verse: Cuz I was hungry an you guys wen give me food fo eat. I was thirsty an you guys wen give me someting fo drink. I wen go one new place wea nobody neva know me, an you guys wen say, ‘Eh, come stay our house.’

36.verse: I neva had clotheses, an you guys wen give me clotheses. I was sick an you guys wen take care me. I wen stay inside da prison an you guys wen come see me.

37.verse: “Den da guys who everytime do da right ting goin aks me, ‘Boss, wen was dis, dat you was hungry an we wen give you food fo eat? Wen was dis, dat you was thirsty, an we wen give you someting fo drink?

38.verse: Wen was dis, dat you wen go one new place wea nobody know you, an we wen say, “Eh, come stay our house”? Wen was dis, dat you neva had clotheses, an we wen give you clotheses?

39.verse: Wen was dis, dat you was sick o inside da prison, an we wen come see you?’

40.verse: “Me, da King, I goin say, ‘Dass it! I tell you guys fo shua, wateva you guys wen do fo one a my bruddas, no matta peopo tink da guy not importan, was me you guys wen do um fo.’

41.verse: “Den I goin tell da odda guys on my left side, ‘Go way from hea, you guys! God goin punish you guys! Go inside da fire dat stay ready fo da Devil an his angel messenja guys, da fire dat no goin mahke eva.

42.verse: Cuz I was hungry an you guys neva give me food. I was thirsty an you guys neva give me notting fo drink.

43.verse: I wen go one new place wea nobody know me, an you guys neva tell me come stay wit you. I neva had clotheses, an you guys neva give me notting fo wear. I was sick an inside da prison, an you guys neva bodda fo come see me.’

44.verse: “Den dem buggas goin tell, ‘Boss, wen was dis, dat you was hungry, o thirsty, o one new guy in town, o no mo clotheses, o sick, o inside da prison, an we neva come fo kokua you?’

45.verse: “I goin tell um, ‘Dass it! I tell you guys fo shua, da stuff you guys neva do fo one guy dat da peopo tink not importan, was me you neva do um fo.’

46.verse: “Den da bad guys going way, an suffa foeva. But da guys dat everytime do da right ting, dey goin live to da max foeva.”

1.verse: Dey Make Plan Fo Kill Jesus - Afta Jesus pau teach all dis stuff, he tell his guys,

2.verse: “You guys know dis awready -- get ony two days till da Passova time. I da Guy Who Fo Real, but wen da Passova time come, dey goin set me up fo kill me on top one cross.”

3.verse: Dat time, da main priest guys an da older leadas fo da peopo wen come togedda inside da Head Priest guy palace. Kaiafas, he da Head Priest dat time.

4.verse: Dey say, “How we goin trick Jesus so we can bus um? Den we can kill um.”

5.verse: Dey say, “We no can do um wen get da Passova time, cuz bumbye da peopo goin make big noise an fight.”

6.verse: One Wahine Put Perfume On Top Jesus Head - Jesus was Simonʼs house, inside Betany town. Simon, he was one lepa guy befo time.

7.verse: Wen Jesus stay eating ova dea, had one wahine dat wen bring one fancy bottle made from alabaster rock. Inside had da kine fancy perfume dat cost plenny. She wen put da perfume on top his head wen he was eating.

8.verse: Jesus guys wen see dat, an dey wen come all huhu. Dey say, “How come she throw way her money lidat?

9.verse: How come she neva sell dat perfume fo plenny money, an give um to da peopo dat no mo notting?”

10.verse: Wen Jesus wen know wat dey saying, he tell um, “How come you guys give dis wahine hard time? Eh! No bodda her! She wen do dis fo me wit plenny aloha.

11.verse: Everytime goin get poor peopo stay wit you guys, but I no goin stay wit you guys everytime, you know.

12.verse: Wen she wen put dis perfume on top me, dis wen make me ready fo wen dey goin bury me.

13.verse: Dass right! An I like tell you guys dis too: weaevas my guys goin teach da Good Kine Stuff Bout Me, all ova da whole world, dey goin tell wat dis wahine wen do, an da peopo goin rememba her.”

14.verse: Judas Set Jesus Up - Den Judas Iscariot wen go talk to da main priest guys. He one a Jesus twelve guys.

15.verse: He aks um, “Eh, how much money you guys goin give me if I set him up fo you guys?” So dey make one deal an give him thirty silva coins.

16.verse: From den Judas wen look fo one chance fo set Jesus up.

17.verse: Jesus Eat Da Passova Food Wit His Guys - Every year, get one week jus fo da Bread Dat No Mo Yeast. Dass da time wen dey no put yeast inside da bread fo make um come big. On da first day, Jesus guys wen go by him an aks um, “Wea you like us make da stuff ready fo you fo eat da Passova kine food?”

18.verse: He say, “Go by dis one guy inside town. Tell um, ‘Da Teacha say: Time awready fo me. I like eat da Passova food wit my guys inside yoa house.’ ”

19.verse: So da guys wen do jalike he wen tell um, an dey make da food ready fo da Passova dinna.

20.verse: Afta da sun go down, Jesus sit down fo eat wit his twelve guys.

21.verse: Dey eating, an he say, “I tell you guys fo shua, one a you guys goin set me up.”

22.verse: Dey come real sad, an each guy tell um, one afta da odda, “Boss, eh, fo shua you not talking bout me, yeah?”

23.verse: Jesus say, “Da guy who wen put his piece bread inside da same sauce wit me, he da guy dat goin set me up.

24.verse: I da Guy Who Fo Real. I goin mahke jalike da Bible wen say befo time. But auwe! Da guy who goin set me up goin get it! Mo betta he neva been born!”

25.verse: Judas, da guy who goin set him up, he say, “Teacha, eh, fo shua you not talking bout me, yeah?” Jesus tell him, “Fo shua, you da guy.”

26.verse: Da Dinna Wit Da Boss - Dey eating, an Jesus take one piece bread an tell God he good heart fo give peopo food. He broke da bread, an give um to his guys. He tell um, “Take dis an eat um. Dis hea, my body.”

27.verse: Den Jesus wen take da cup, an tell God “Mahalo plenny!” an give um to his guys. He say, “All you guys, drink dis.

28.verse: Dis hea, my blood fo make solid da new deal dat God making. Dey goin kill me, an my blood goin come out from my body jalike wen dey kill one sacrifice. Dat goin help plenny peopo, so God can let um go an hemo dea shame fo all da bad kine stuff dey do.

29.verse: An I telling you guys, afta dis, I no goin drink dis kine wine, till da time come wen we all stay togedda wea my Fadda stay King. Dat time, I goin drink da new kine wine wit you guys.”

30.verse: Jesus dem wen sing one song fo tell God “Mahalo,” an wen go by Olive Ridge.

31.verse: Peter Goin Say He Donno Who Jesus - Ova dea, Jesus tell um, “All you guys goin bum out cuz you no can handle da shame fo wat goin happen to me tonite. Cuz God wen say befo time inside da Bible, ‘I goin kill da sheep farma, an all his sheeps goin run all ova da place.’

32.verse: But I goin come back alive afta I mahke, an den, I going Galilee side. Den you guys goin go by me ova dea.”

33.verse: Den Peter say, “Eh, no way, Boss! No matta all da odda guys bum out an like go way from you, eh, no way I eva goin do dat!”

34.verse: Jesus tell him, “You tink so? I tell you dis: Befo da roosta make noise early today, three times you goin say dat you donno who me.”

35.verse: But Peter tell him, “No way! Not even! No matta I gotta mahke wit you, no way I goin say I donno who you!” An all da odda guys say same ting.

36.verse: Jesus Pray Inside Getsemane Place - Den Jesus dem go da place dey call Getsemane. He tell da guys, “Sit down ova hea an wait. I going ova dea fo pray.”

37.verse: He take Peter an da two Zebedee boys wit him. Den he wen come real sore inside, an he get plenny stress inside him.

38.verse: He tell um, “Eh, you know, my heart stay real sad, jalike I goin mahke. No go sleep -- stay ova hea wit me.”

39.verse: He go mo down, an go down on top da groun, an talk to God lidis: “Eh, God, you my Fadda. If you can, no let me suffa lidis. But if no can, dass okay. I like do um da way you like me do um.”

40.verse: He go back by his guys, an dey stay sleeping. He tell Peter, “So, wat? You guys no can stay up wit me fo ony one hour?

41.verse: Hang in dea an aks God fo help you, so you no go do da bad kine stuff wen you get chance. You know, inside, I know you guys like do da right ting, but you guys no can do um, cuz you guys no stay strong inside.”

42.verse: Den Jesus go talk to God one mo time, an say, “Fadda, if dis kine suffa no can go way from me, ony if I take um, az okay, I still yet do um. I like do um da way you like me do um.”

43.verse: Jesus come back, an his guys stay sleeping again, cuz dea eyes no can stay open.

44.verse: So he go way from dem one mo time, an talk to God one mo time, an he say da same tings jalike befo.

45.verse: Jesus come back by his guys an say, “So, wat? You guys still sleeping an resting! Nuff awready! Da time stay now! I da Guy Who Fo Real, an dey goin set me up fo da bad guys.

46.verse: Get up! We go by dem now. Da guy who wen set me up stay hea now awready.”

47.verse: Dey Bus Jesus - Wen Jesus still talking, Judas, one a his twelve guys, wen come ova dea. Had plenny odda guys wit him. Dey carry swords an clubs. Da main priest guys, an da older leadas, dey da guys who wen send um.

48.verse: Now, befo time, Judas wen tell um, “Da guy I goin kiss, az da guy. Grab um an tell da police guys fo take um!”

49.verse: So Judas wen go by Jesus an say, “Aloha, Teacha!” an wen kiss um.

50.verse: Jesus wen tell um, “My friend, do wat you wen come ova hea fo do.” Den da odda guys come an grab Jesus an take um.

51.verse: An you know wat? One a Jesus guys wen grab his sword an hit one guy dat work fo da Head Priest, an cut off one a his ears.

52.verse: Jesus tell him, “Put away yoa sword. Everybody who use his sword fo beef goin die from da sword.

53.verse: Tink bout dis: right now I can aks my Fadda fo help, an he goin send me mo den twelve armies a angel guys.

54.verse: But gotta happen dis way, so dat da tings da Bible wen say befo time, goin happen.”

55.verse: Right den an dea he tell all da peopo, “You guys tink I one crook, o wat? You guys tink you gotta come afta me wit swords an clubs fo bus me? Eh, I was wit you guys teaching inside da temple yard every day, an you neva bus me dat time.

56.verse: But all dis gotta happen, jalike da guys dat wen talk fo God wen write inside da Bible.” Den all his guys wen bag, an he stay dea all by himself.

57.verse: Jesus Stand In Front Da Main Leada Guys - Da guys who wen bus Jesus wen bring um in front Kaiafas, da Head Priest guy. Ova dea da teacha guys who teach Godʼs Rules an da older leadas fo da peopo wen come togedda.

58.verse: Peter wen follow Jesus to da Head Priest place, but he wen stay far. He go inside da yard an sit down ova dea wit da police guys fo see wat goin happen.

59.verse: Da main priest guys an all da main leadas wen try fo find guys fo bulai bout Jesus in front da judge, so da leada guys can kill Jesus.

60.verse: Plenny guys come an try bulai bout Jesus, but still yet dey no can find nobody dat say wat da leada guys like. In da end two guys wen come.

61.verse: Dey say, “Eh, dis bugga wen tell peopo, ‘I can broke down Godʼs temple, an den, befo three days pau, I goin build um up again.’ ”

62.verse: Den da Head Priest guy wen stand up an say, “Eh, you no hear wat dese guys saying bout you? You no goin say notting, o wat?”

63.verse: But Jesus no talk. So da Head Priest guy tell him, “Eh, you! You gotta swear to God bout dis. Tell us in front da God who stay alive fo real kine! Tell us dat, if you da Christ guy dat God suppose to send. You Godʼs Boy, o wat?”

64.verse: Den Jesus tell um, “You da guy wen jus say dat. I even telling you guys, bumbye you guys goin see me, sitting down on top da spesho place by da God Who Get All Da Power, right dea on his right side. An I goin come back on top da clouds inside da sky. Den you goin see me, I da Guy Who Fo Real.”

65.verse: Den da Head Priest guy wen rip his own clothes cuz he wen come real mad, fo show dat he tink Jesus wen talk stink bout God. He say, “Wat you guys tink now? No need mo plenny guys fo tell wat dey wen see an hear bout him, yeah? You guys wen hear da bad kine stuff he say bout God!

66.verse: Wat you guys tink?” Dey all say, “He gotta mahke!”

67.verse: Den dey spit on top Jesus face, an punch him, an some guys slap his head wit dea hand.

68.verse: Dey tell Jesus, “Eh you, da Christ guy! If you one talka fo God, tell us who wen wack you!”

69.verse: Peter Say He Donno Who Jesus - All dis time Peter stay sitting outside da house, inside da yard. Had one girl who work fo da Head Priest guy wen go by him, an say, “Eh, you was wit Jesus too, yeah? da bugga from Galilee side, aah?”

70.verse: But he tell everybody, “No way! I donno wat you talking bout!”

71.verse: Den he go ova dea by da gate, an had one nodda girl dat work ova dea, she wen spock him. She tell da guys who standing ova dea, “Hey! Dis da bugga was wit Jesus, you know, da guy from Nazaret town!”

72.verse: Den Peter say, “Not! I swear to God, I donno who dat!”

73.verse: Den bumbye, da guys who was standing near Peter say, “Yeah! You one a dem guys too! You talk jalike you from dat place!”

74.verse: Peter swear real bad, an den he say, “God punish me if I no tell you da trut: I donno who dat!” Right den an dea, da roosta wen make big noise.

75.verse: Den Peter rememba wat Jesus wen say, “Befo da roosta make noise, three times you goin say you donno who me.” So den he wen go outside an broke down an bus out crying.

1.verse: Jesus In Front Da Governa - Early morning time, all da main priest guys an da older leadas fo da peopo wen go figga out how dey goin kill Jesus.

2.verse: Dey tie him up, take him away, an wen give him to Pilate, da governa.

3.verse: Judas Mahke - Now Judas, da guy dat wen set up Jesus, wen see wat wen happen. Afta he find out dat dey really goin kill Jesus fo real kine, he come sorry an start fo tink diffren. So, he take back all da thirty silva coins fo give um to da main priest guys an da older leadas dat wen give um to him befo.
